1a1(rgyud 'grel): dpal mkha' 'go rgya mtsho'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs bzhags//
1b1(rgyud 'grel): dpal bcom ldan 'das mkha' 'gro
1b2(rgyud 'grel): rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo// gang zhig sangs rgyas
2a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi// thugs rjes kun bsdus ngo bo'i sku// dngos kun gcig bsdus rang bzhin te// rgyud kyi phyag can
2a2(rgyud 'grel): lhan skyes zhal// gnyis med shes rab phag mo dang // lhan cig bzhugs pa de la 'dud// mkhyen pa'i gsung gi 'od zer
2a3(rgyud 'grel): gyis// snod ldan blo mun sel mdzad cing // don gyi bdud rtsis tshim mdzad pa// mtsho skyes la sogs bla ma'i tshogs// zla ba lta bu
2b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams la 'dud// dpal ldan mkha 'gro rgya mtsho yo// bla ma'i man ngag mngon rtogs rom// rnga bzhin rtogs pa'i nus mod kyang // bdag nyid dran phyir bro bar bya// / de la thog mar/
2b2(rgyud 'grel): dpal mkha' gro rgya mtsho'i dbang bskur ngo'i rim pas dag par byas pa zab pa dang rgya che ba la lhag par mos pas rgyud kyi don khong du chud pa'i slob pa pos skye bo med pa'i sa phyogs dang
2b3(rgyud 'grel): ri bo dang / ri'i phug dang / bya skyibs dang / rgya mtsho chen po'i gam dang / gdod ma nas grub pa'i dur khrod dang / gang du yid dga' ba'i gnasu yang rung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ras ris
2b4(rgyud 'grel): dang gdor ma dang mchod yon la sogs pa'i nye bar spyad pa rnams dang ldan pa'i bsam gtan gyi gnas bstar ba/ bdud rtsis gtor zhing lkog gca lnga bkram pra dag hA byas pa the
3a1(rgyud 'grel): rang sa smad pa dang / rdo rje rnal 'drar ma rnams kyis gru dang rlung taSha sdus bskul bar bsams te/ gdang gi gtsang sgra la sogs byas nas/ ra dngos kyi stong bam me'i phags pasna tshogs rdo thos pa'i steng du/ kAr gra
3a2(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi'i ri lu bcug pa lhor mngon par phyogs pos/ rdo rje'i skyil lung la sogs pas 'dug ste/ lag pa g.yon pa'i dbus su dang mthe'u chung nas bzung ba'i sor mo rnams kyi rtsa ba la/ dpa' mo'i ge cha rnams kyis sbyang ba dang / bcom ldan
3a3(rgyud 'grel): 'das kyi go cha yang dbus dang sor mo rnams kyi rtse mo la dgod ngo do// de nas pad+ma'i snod myos byed bzang pos bkang la lag pa g.yas pa'i mthil du bzhag ste/ g.yon pa'i srin lag gis chos 'thung gi ri mo bya nong / ya gA gsum brjid
3a4(rgyud 'grel): pas bdud rtsir bsams te/ de nyid kyi mthe bong dang srin lag sbyar bas chung gtor te yan lag lnga la khrus dang / 'thor 'thung dang / mchod pa'i rdzas rnams la bsang gtor yang bya'o// de nas rang gi mdun du chang de nyid dang / hri
3a5(rgyud 'grel): zhim po bsres pas maN+Dal gru bzhi par byugs te me tog sil mas gtor la rdo rje'i phyag rgyas rig cing b+hUr b+hu ba staHzhes brjod pas sa 'og dang sa steng drang mtho ris kyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlab bo// de nas oM AHs+thA nA me
3a6(rgyud 'grel): rak+Sha hUM zhes brjod cing me tog gcig rang gi 'og tu bzhag pa gnas bsrung bar bya'o// oM AHAt+ma nA~M me rik+Sha hUM zhes bya ba dang / me tog gcig rang gi mgo bor bzhag ste bdag nyid bsrung bar bya'o// 'khyud pa'i phyag
3b1(rgyud 'grel): AHyo ga me rAk+Sha d+hU zhes bya bas rnal 'byor bsrung bar bya'o// do'i rjes smra sems can 'khor ba sdug bsngal b+h+rUM rgya mtshor byung ba rnams phyag rgya chen po'i gau 'phang la bzhag pa'i phyir bdag gi dpal mkha' 'gro rgyasprul pa
3b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes sems bskyed do// de nas tha mal po'i lus nyid la dpa' bo'i go cha'i sngags brjod cing gnas de dang der rdo rje'i phyag rgya reg pas go ma bu'o// de nas me tog dang bcas pa'i thal mo sbyar la/ dpal ldan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ni/ mkha'
3b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ma'i 'khor lo sbyar// ye shes lha dang sku gsum ste// 'gro ba skyob la phyag 'tshalo// ji snyed rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// rnam par rtog pa'i 'ching gcod cing // 'jig rten bya ba rab 'jug ma// de snyed rnams la rtag phyag 'tshal// sring
3b4(rgyud 'grel): rgya mtshor yongs bying ba// gang dag yongasu sgrol mkhas pa'i// bla ma dam pa'i drin gang gis// bdag la ye shes 'di bskyed 'dud// ces bya bas mkha' 'gro dang / mkha' 'gro ma rnams dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams yid
3b5(rgyud 'grel): kyis gsal bar byas la/ me tog gtor cing phyag bya'o// de nas cho ga nas bshad pa bzhin du bcom ldan 'das 'khor da bcas pa la gtor ma dbul bar bya'o// de nas bdag nyid skad cig gis bde mchog zhal bzhi byas pacu gnyi
3b6(rgyud 'grel): pa sku mdog sngon po phag mo dang bcas pa bsgom pa ni lus dag par byed pa'o// rang gi snying gar paM yongasu gyur pa las sna tshogs pad ma 'dab ma brgyad pa/ de'i steng du raM yongasu gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang / de'i steng du
4a1(rgyud 'grel): yi ge hUM kha dog nag po ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs 'phro bzhin pa bsams la/ ngag tu thog mar oM dang mthar hUM hUM phaT dang ldan pa'i A li kA li brjod pas hUM gi nA da las yi ge'i phreng ba/
4a2(rgyud 'grel): dog sa tshogs 'phro bzhin pa bton te g.yon gyi lus kyi stong du sngon po dang bar du dmar po dang smad du dkar po'i phreng bas dkris te de dag las khams gsum gyi rigasu ga togs pa'i lha'i tshogs rim pa bzhin du spyod dang bar dang / smang
4a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams las gzugs med pa dang gzugs dang 'dod pa'i khams kyi ris rnams smras te khams gsum gyi bgegs rnams med par byas nas/ rang rang gi gnas su bsdu ba ni/ dgra dag par byed bya'o// de nas spyi bo dang / dpral bad
4a4(rgyud 'grel): mchi dang / snying ga'i zad kyi na mkha' la shrI hUM ru ka'i yi ge bzhi kha dog sngon po bsams lnga de rnams kyi don dran par bya ste/ de yang shrI yig 'byung ba kun gyi don/ phyi dang nang gi byadag nyid 'dod// 'di dag kun rdzob gzugs dang ni
4a5(rgyud 'grel): dbade ba'i mtha' can gang // e baM la sogs gnyis med pa'ang // shrI zhes bya ba'i yig nges brjod// he yI ga snying ga nas kun tu// hUM ru ka sogs rang 'khor 'gro/ bsgom pa kun gyi 'byung gnas las// 'dzin pa la
4a6(rgyud 'grel): sog rnams bskyed 'gyur// da ni rgyu stong bdag nyid de// rgyu yi bdag nyid mi rtog pa'o// rang bzhin chos bdag med pa nyid// de ni stong pa'i rnal 'byor gnas// bkod pa gang zag bdag med pa// rtog pa'i dra ba chen po ni// ru yig rkye
4b1(rgyud 'grel): gyis bdag nyid can// de ni bdag gi bkod bral ba'o// slar brjod ka ni ma lus pa'i// bdag gis gnyis byar med shes gang // glang phyir ci la'ang mi gnas pa// de phyir ka zhes bya bar brjod ces bya ba dang / dngos po mngon sum stong pa min/
4b2(rgyud 'grel): dngos po tsam gyi rang bzhin can// dpal he ru ka gnas lha mo// snga nas sgo kun 'gro ba'o zhes bya ba brjod cing don dran par bya ba ni yid dag par byed pa'o// de nas phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams lha'i nga rgyal bsgom par bya'o// de
4b3(rgyud 'grel): nas gzugs kyi phung po ni rnam par snang mdzad do// tshor ba'i phung po ni rdo rje nyi ma'o// 'du shes kyi phung po ni pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug/ 'du byed kyi phung po ni rdo rje rgyal po'o// rnam par shes pa'i phung po ni rdo rje sems dpa'o// de bzhin gshegs
4b4(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid ni shrI he ru ka rdo rje'o// mig dag ni gti mug rdo rje'o// nyan pa dag ni zhe sdang rdo rje'o// sna dag ni phrag dog rdo rje'o// kha dag ni 'dod chags rdo rje'o// reg ni ser sna rdo rje'o// skye mchod thams cad ni dbang phyug rdo rje'o// sa'i
4b5(rgyud 'grel): khams ni ltung bar byed ma'o// chu'i khams ni gsod me'o// me'i khams 'gugs ma'o// rlung gi khams ni gar gyi dbang phyug ma'o// na mkha'i khams ni pad ma 'bar ma'o// de rnams kyang slob dpon shes rab srungs kyi bkod pa bzhin du rtogs par bya
4b6(rgyud 'grel): de nas g.yon pa'i 'dzub mo dang mthe bong brdabs pa sngon du 'gro bas// oM suM b+ha ri suM b+ha kA yi kaM huM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na bA tsi ka huM hUM phaT/ mo gr-ih+NA pa la grIdz+nyA ba la tsa ra si maM huM hUM phaT/ oM A na ya hoHb+ha ga wan badz+ra dz+nyA ni kaM huM hU~M phaT ces brjod pas snying ga'i hUM las
5a1(rgyud 'grel): kha dog nag po dang / ljang gu dang / dmar po dang / ser po'i mdog can rnams te tshangs pa'i mtha' nas 'og gser gyi sa gzhi la thug gi bar du sngags kyi gzugs chen po shar dang byang dang nub dang lho'i phyogs rnams kha phyir
5a2(rgyud 'grel): phyogs pa rim pas spros dgod par bya'o// de nas rang gi 'og gi char ram yongasu gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la hUM sngon po yongasu gyur pa las sna tshogs rdo rje shin tu chen po gser gyi sa gzhi la thug pa/ hU~M gis byin gyis brlabs
5a3(rgyud 'grel): pa bsams la/ de'i 'od zer dang sum b+ha la sogs pa'i sngags kyi 'od zer rnams kyis rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi rab gru bzhi pa kha dog sngar dang mthun pa dang / rdo rje dang hUM gi 'od zer rnams kyi steng du rdo rje rtse lnga pa ljang gu'i mda'i dra ba dang /
5a4(rgyud 'grel): de'i 'og tu rdo rje'i gur dang bla re yang bsam par bya'o// de nas suM b+ha la sogs pa'i sngags bzhi las grub pa'i khwa'i gdong can ma la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhi dang / oM dang hUM hUM phaT las grub pa'i gshin rje brtan ma la sogs pa bzhi po
5a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma phyag g.yas pas rdo rje thob bsnams shing / g.yon pas rang 'dra ba'i lha mo lte ba man chad phur bu'i rnam pa can g.yas na gri gug g.yon na thod pa thog pa bsnams pa rnams la/ sarba bid+d+ha A
5a6(rgyud 'grel): na ya dzaHzhes bya ba brjod pas/ phyogs mtshamasu son pa'i bgegs kyi tshogs rnams ra ba'i phyi rol tu bkug pa'i dbus brgyad du/ hUM phyogs skyong gi kha dog dang mthun pa bsams te/ bgegs kyi tshogs rnams hUM laM
5b1(rgyud 'grel): bsdus la/ de rnams gyur pa las phyogs skyong brgyad du bskyed par bya'o// de nas hUM gi sgra drag la ring ba bsgrags pas/ de rnams rang rang gi mdun du me'i dong chen po dmigs te lha mo rnams kyis de rnams bcug ste phur bus mgo bo nas
5b2(rgyud 'grel): gdab cing / oM g+haHg+haHg+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya sarba duny+dzan phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya sarba pa paM phaT hUM hUM hUM badz+ra kI la badz+ra d+ha ra A dz+nyA pa ya ti big+h+nAM kA ya bak+tsit+ta badz+ra kI la ya hUM phaT ces bya ba lan gsum brjod pas mgrin pa dang snying gar yang gdab
5b3(rgyud 'grel): bo// de nas oM badz+ra mung+ga ra badz+ra badz+ra kI la ko Ta ya hUM phaT ces bya ba lan gsum brjod pas rdo rje tho bas brdungs te rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i srog dang phral nas gnyis su med pa'i ye shes thob pa bsam par bya ste/ lha mo rnams
5b4(rgyud 'grel): ra ba la thim pa dang / phyi nas rim pa bzhin me dang / rdo rje dang pad+ma dang / 'khor lo'i ra ba zlum po ril po bcig pa bsam par bya'o// 'o ba paM hUM zhu ba las rdo rje phra mo rnams par med par gtams te/ bdag dang 'gro ba thams cad kun
5b5(rgyud 'grel): nas bgegs dang bral po'o zhes nga rgyal bya'o// de nas snying ga'i sa bon las spros pa'i 'od zer rnams kyis/ bla ma dang dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho'i dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te sngar gyi maN+Dal dbus su bzhugs par bya'o// de nas aM
5b6(rgyud 'grel): AHhUM zhes lam gsum brjod pas bsang gtor bya'o// oM pra ba ra sat+kA ra pA traM pra tits+tsha swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis zhabs la zhabs bsal dbul bar bya'o// oM pra ba ra sat+kA raM ar+tha pra tits+tsha swA hA zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis lag pa
6a1(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa mtha' nas bye ba'i phyag rgya mthe bong dang srin lag gis me tog dung gi chu la btags pa lan gsum gyis zhabs la mchod yon dbul bar bya'o// de ltar rang rang gi sngags kyis maN+Dal du me tog dbul bar bya'o// de nas tha ma mo//
6a2(rgyud 'grel): cad la oM AHbadz+ra puSh+pe hUM/ oM AHbadz+ra d+hU pe hUM/ oM AHbadz+ra dI pe hUM/ oM AHbadz+ra gan+d+he hUM/ oM AHbadz+ra naM bid+ye hUM/ zhes bya ba rnams kyis kyang mchod par bya'o// rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las spros pa'i mchod pa'i lha mo bcu drug rnams kyis
6a3(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon shes rab srungs kyi ltar mchod par bya'o// de nas rkang pa bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'i sngags kyi bdud rtsi dang bcas po'i chad dbul bar bya'o// kun mkhyen ye shes phung po can// 'gro don rab tu sgrub pa po// yid bzhin nor bu 'dir byung ba/
6a4(rgyud 'grel): dpal sdom khyod la phyag 'tsha lo// sna tshogs ye shes chen pos g.yogs// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// thugs rjes khro badrug chen po// dpal sdom khyod la phyag 'tshalo// zhes bya bos bstod par bya'o// bgyid dang bgyid sa
6a5(rgyud 'grel): rjes su yi rang la sogs sdig pa ma lus pa ni skyon rnams ma lus nges par bcom pa yis// mdun du so sor bshags bya slar la yang ni mi byed pa yi sdom pa gzung ba nyid du bya// nyan thos da ni bse ru bla med rgyal ba rgyal dang rgyal ba'i sras
6a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi bsags pa'i dge ba la// rjes su yi ni rang zhing byang chub yang dag yongasu bsngo bar bdag gis bya// rgyal ba rin chen la sogs gsum la ji snyed skyab su 'gro bar bya ba thams cad du ni bsgom// byang chub sems ni rnam par gzung ngo bla na
6b1(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i lam ni de bzhin bsten// de nas oM AHbadz+ra muHhUM zhes brjod pas gshegs par bya'o// de nas snying rje dang byams pa dang dpa' ba dang tang snyoms dran par bya'o// de'i rjes su oM sarba d+harmAHshUn+ta swa b+hA wa shA n+yo&ha~M/ oM sarba d+harmA
6b2(rgyud 'grel): sab+hA wa shud+d+haHswA b+hA wa shrad+d+he&haM/ oM shUn+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swAb+hA waM At+ma ko&haM/ oM yo ga shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA yo ga rud+d+ho&haM/ zhes bya ba brjod cing don dran par byas te chos thams cad na mkha'i dkyil ltar bsgom par bya'o// de nas sngon gyi b+hUH
6b3(rgyud 'grel): lam gyis sred pa'i sems ni mkha' la nA da la rim gyis rdzogs pa'i hUM blta'o// de dang dus mnyam du bsrung ba'i ri ba la sogs pa rnams kyang blta bar bya'o// de'i nang ga 'og char yaM sngon po yongasu gyur pa las rlung gi dkyil 'khor sngon
6b4(rgyud 'grel): po bzhu'i dbyibs lta bu mtha' gnyis na g.yo bzhin pa'i ba dan yaM gis byin gyis brlab bo// de'i steng du raM dmar po yongasu gyur pa las me'i dkyil 'khor dmar po gru gsum pa 'bar bzhin pa'i grwa can raM yig gis byin gyis brlab pa'o//
6b5(rgyud 'grel): de'i steng du baM dkar po yongasu gyur pa las chu'i dkyil 'khor dkar po zlum po bum pa dang bcas pa la baM yig go// de'i steng du lam ser po yongasu gyur pa las/ sa'i dkyil 'khor ser po gru bzhi pa grwar rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang ldan pa
6b6(rgyud 'grel): laM yig gis byin gyis brlabs pa'o// de'i steng du yi ge suM kha dog sna tshogs pa yongasu gyur pa las rin po che gzhi'i rang bzhin gyi ri rab zur bzhi pa rtse mo brgyad dang ldan pa suM yig gis byin gyis brlabs pa'o// de'i steng du paM yod
7a1(rgyud 'grel): su gyur pa las sna tshogs pad+ma de'i steng du d+hu yongasu gyur pa las sna tshogs rdo rje bsams te/ 'thung ba rnams zhu zhing sla ba'i rang bzhin du gyur nas gcig tu 'dres pas ri rab 'og tu lhung bas 'byung ba zhu ba'i gong bu sna
7a2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs rdo rje'i steng du chags pa yongasu gyur pa las/ gzhal med khang sgo rim pa bzhi dang ldan pa ste/ dbus su ni chos kyi 'byung gnas gru gsum pa'i nang du'o// gnyis pa gru bzhi pa las gsum pa gru lnga pa dang bzhi par zur drug pa
7a3(rgyud 'grel): nang du ste/ mdog dmar po steng du bltas pa rnamaso// dkyil 'kho gsum ni zlum po yin la kun gyi phyi ma ni gru bzhi pa ste/ kun kyang gzhal yas khang gi rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa dur khrod dang bcas pa'o// dkyil 'khor nang
7a4(rgyud 'grel): ma ni g.yas g.yon gnyis kyi rlung gnyis dbu mar 'dus pa'i rang bzhin gnag pa dang sngo ba'i rtsig pa gnyis pa'o// gnyis pa ni sku gsung thugs dag pa'i rang bzhin sngo ba dang dmar po dang dkar po'i rtsig pa gsum dang ldan pa'o//
7a5(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa ni dga' ba bzhi dag pa'i rang bzhin sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu'i ri mo bzhi dang ldan pa'o// kun gyi phyi rol ni ye shes lnga dag pa ste phyi rol tu dkar po dang bcas pa'o// kun gyi dkyil 'khor dbus mi da /
7a6(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs pad ma 'dab ma bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa/ lte ba la nyi ma'i steng du 'jigs byed chen po dang dus kyi mtshan mo'o// de'i phyi rol tu 'khor lo rim pa gsum dang ldan pa/ de'i phyi rol bskal bzang po'i snam bu dang bcas pa'o//
7b1(rgyud 'grel): phyi ma rnams la yang dus kyis pad ma gtogs pa'o// pad ma'i phyi rol nas nang gi phyi ma'i 'khor lo'i bar gyi mtshams rnams kyi phreng ba ni rim pa bzhin du gri gug dang rin po che dang rdo rje dang pad ma dang 'khor lo dang ral gri dang sna tshogs rdo rje
7b2(rgyud 'grel): dang thod pa dang mgo bo dang keng rus dang zhags pa dang lcags kyu'i phreng ba rnams kyis bskor ba'o// 'khor lo'i rtsibs rnams ni sum cu rtsa drug go/ 'khor lo'i rtsibs re re'i steng du'ang ro'i gdan re re'o// de bzhin du pad ma'i 'dab ma lha'i gnas
7b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang sgo dang mtshams rnamasu yang ngo // lha'i gnas ma yin pa mtshams kyi pad+ma rnams la ni rin po che'i bum pa re re'o// 'khor lo'i kha dog rnams ni 'chang bar 'gyur te/ de ltar rten gyi dkyil 'khor dmigs te rgyas par ni 'chad
7b4(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur ba rnams kyis kyang shes par bya'o// de nas 'jigs byed dang dus mtshan gyi steng gi char A li nyis 'gyur g.yon bskor las de'i gzugs brnyan dang ldan pa'i zla ba bsgom pa ni me long lta bu'o// de'i steng du kA li yar la3
7b5(rgyud 'grel): DaD+ha dang bcas pa nyis 'gyur g.yon bskor las de'i gzugs brnyan dang bcas pa'i nyi ma ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ngo bo'o// de gnyis kyi dbus su steng gi hUM zhugs te 'khor lo bcu gnyis kyi lha rnams spros te 'gro ba thams cad de'i bdag
7b6(rgyud 'grel): nyid can byas nas 'dus te de nyid du zhugs pas rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga pa/ lte ba la hUM gis byin gyis brlabs pa ni so sor rtog pa'i rang bzhi no// hUM las kyang 'od zer sna tshogs dpag tu med pa byung ste sngar lha nyid du bsgrub pa ma lus pa
8a1(rgyud 'grel): dang gdod ma nas grub pa thams cad bkug ste/ de nyid du bzhugs pa 'din byung zung ba'o// nga rnams thams cad yongasu gyur pa las chu'i rkyen klu bsgyud pa ni chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam pa dag pa'i ngo bo ste yang sku mdog da
8a2(rgyud 'grel): zhal bzhi pa/ spyan gsum phyag ni bcu gnyis pa/ shes rab kha sbyor sbyor bdag nyid byis pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o// dkar dang ljang gu dmar ba dang / ser po g.yon nas bskor ba'i// zhal gyi ral pa'i cod par la// sna tshogs rdo rje zla phyed 'dzin/
8a3(rgyud 'grel): 'phrog byed dkar mo mnyam par mnan// g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis yang dag bzhugs// rdo rje dril bu grang chen gyi// pags pa cang te'u gri gug dang // dgra sta rtse gsum de bzhin du// kha T+wAM ga snod zhags pa dang // mgo ste g.yon dang g.yas
8a4(rgyud 'grel): par ro// shes rab rang dang 'dra ba la// 'on kyang bud med mtshan nyid ldan// de nas de nyid kyi thugs kar nyi ma la gnas pa'i hUM gi sa bon blta bar bya ste 'di ni bsnyen pa'o// de nas yab kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje mi dmigs pa la hUM sngon po la rdo rje
8a5(rgyud 'grel): sngon po rtse lnga pa'o// yi ge byaM dmar sder las nor bu ste de nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs pas/ bu gar phaT ser po mgo phyir bstan pa'o// AHdmar po las yum gyi pad ma dmar po 'dab ma gsum pa/ trAM dkar ser las zi 'bru de nyid kyis
8a6(rgyud 'grel): mtshan pa/ bu gar phaT ser po mgo phyir bstan pa'o// de nas rig ma la rdo rje phag mo'i snying po dang nye ba'i snying po dang bcom ldan 'das kyi snying po dang nye ba'i snying po rim pa ji lta bus lte ba dang snying kha dang mgrin pa dang dpral bar bkod de tsum pa
8b1(rgyud 'grel): na bya'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das mas kyang de nyid kyi snying po dang nye ba'i snying po mgrin pa dang dpral bar bkod de rang nyid kyi lte ba dang snying gar bkod la tsum+b+ha na bya'o// de nas yi ge gsum brjod cing dga' pa brtsam par bya ste/ snying ga'i sa bon gyi
8b2(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer dang / rdo rje dang pad ma'i dga' ba'i sgras phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bskul te/ zhal du zhugs nas lha mo'i pad mar babs pa dang gnyis ka bde ba chen po lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bor zhu bar gyur pa dngul chu'i rdog ma lta bu ste 'di
8b3(rgyud 'grel): ni nye ba'i bsnyen pa'o// de nas byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms kyi rang bzhin mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi thig le de nyid las 'bon te rang rang gi gan su pad ma'i 'dab ma rnams la 'dug nas bskul bar
8b4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa ste/ de yang mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa drug gis mgrin gcig tu mnga' bdag nyi ma re rer 'gro ba 'gron 'bod na// khyod ni ci'i phyir na stong pa nyid du bzhugs// bzhengs shig bzhengs shig bdag ni snying rje'i rang bzhin te// rdo rje'i 'dzin pa bde
8b5(rgyud 'grel): chen bdag la 'dod pa mdzod// lA ma la sogs pa rnams kyis// gson cig gson cig gzhan gyi dgos pa nub// 'jig rten phyugs gang shi ba bzhin du gyur// bdag gi pad ma rgyas pa la 'dod mdzod// de ltar 'jig rten kun bder gyur par byos
8b6(rgyud 'grel): dum skyes ma la sogs pas// rdo rje 'dzin pa bdag la rol cig rol// lhan skyes rang bzhin brjod du med pa thob// sems can 'jig rten gzhani rmongs gyur pas// ji ltar khyod ni stong pa don med gyur// gzugs can ma la sogs pas kyang //
9a1(rgyud 'grel): khyod ni chos rnams kun gyi byed pa ste// ci'i phyir ldan skyes rang bzhin 'gro med bzhugs// bdag la mchog gi don gyis 'dod pa mdzod// ji ltar khyod ni 'jig rten rnams mthun bzhud// de nas de rnams thig le de nyid la
9a2(rgyud 'grel): zhugs par blta'o// de nas thig le de nyid yongasu gyur pa las hU~M gi yi ge sngon po'o// de las rdo rje sngon portswa lnga pa lte bar hUM ljang sngon dang bcas pa'o// de yongasu gyur pa las dkyil 'khor ba dang bcas pa skad cig gis rdzogs par blta ba ni gas
9a3(rgyud 'grel): sngags 'di 'don bzhin pa'o// de yang glu 'dis rjes su bskul ba yis// rang nyid he'u kar rabasad// oM AHkA ya bA k+Shit+ta badz+ra hUM phaT hoHgsang sngags 'di ni 'don pa na// skad cig rnam pa'i rnal 'byor ldan// skad cig sngags pas
9a4(rgyud 'grel): byung bdag nyid// dpa' bo kun dang rnal 'byor ma'o// 'jigs byed mtshan mo nag mo dang // lte ba nyi ma me mchog la// gar du mdzad pa yi ni sku// gnag dang ljang gu phyed phyed do// bdun cu rtsa drug phyag dang ni// zhal bcu bdun la spyan gsum
9a5(rgyud 'grel): pa// dpa' bo ral pa'i cod pan 'dzin// sna tshogs rdo rje zla phyed can// mche ba chen po gcig pa'i zhal// g.yas dang g.yon pa rtag tu ni// ser ba dang ni ljang khur grags// nub ni dmar po de bzhin te// lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba mtshungs//
9a6(rgyud 'grel): mche ba gtsigs pa 'jigs par byed// rim pa ji lta'i mtshon cha'i tshogs// g.yas dang g.yon par shes par bya// glang chen pags pa phyag gnyis kyis// skye gnas phyag rgya de bzhin gzhan// rdo rje ral gri mdung rings dang // rtse gsum ji
9b1(rgyud 'grel): lha rim pas g.yas// dgra sta gri gug mda' dang ni// gsal shing phug dang tho ba dang // 'khor lo cad te'u chu gri dang // dbyug tho dang ni mtshon rtse gcig/ dung dang zangs dung dbyig gu dang // rma bya'i mjug ma de bzhin du// bya rog sgo dang pir dang ni
9b2(rgyud 'grel): me yi thab dang ri bo dang // dbug pA me long pi wang dang // rkang mgo lag pa glo ba dang // sgyu ma sgra gcan lcags sgrogs dang // gdos dang dum bu pa nya d+ha// mgo med 'bar ba'i mar nag dang // 'jigs byed gzugs te rim pas// g.yon par
9b3(rgyud 'grel): dril bu phub rings mche// gtun shing zhags pa thod pa dang // gzhu dang kha T+wAM ga po ti// phub chung yu can sdigs mdzu ba dang // g.yer ga'i phreng dang lcags sgrogs dang // brag dang dur khrod rdul dang ni// b+ho ka ma rnga dang pags rlon dang // skra yi thag pa 'phyang
9b4(rgyud 'grel): ba dang // ro bsregs bskul ba'i shing bu dang // 'phongs dang phu rings mgo bo dang // keng rus zor ba de bzhin du// mig dang mkhal ma gnye ma dang // spen pa dang ni phur bu dang // sa bon gang ba sog le dang // kha dang skud bshud pags pa dang //
9b5(rgyud 'grel): sprin char 'bab dang shing lcags kyu// phyag gi mtshon chu bdun cu gnyis// de lha'i rim pas shes par bya// mgo bo lnga yis brgya nu du byas// phyag rgya drug dang ldan pas klubs// de bzhin mgo brgya'i phreng ba dang // dpung rgyan zhabs
9b6(rgyud 'grel): gdub sgra sgrogs dang // sru la ba spu'i phreng bar ldan// sku yi tshigs rnams thams cad la// shes rab thabs kyi bde bas brlan// sna tshogs he ru ka 'bar bas// rnam par 'phros bcas rnam bsgom bya// dbu rnams kun la dar dbyangs
10a1(rgyud 'grel): la grags na rnaMs thags rgya na / da nga ma wAg nas / gams
10a2(rgyud 'grel): dang // sdigs mdzub phyogs rnams kun tu mdzad// g.yon pas gdugs pa'i khrag bkang ba'i// thong bcas yab kyi mgul nas khyung // gcer bu spyan gsum skra grol ma// spyan gsum drug mo'i gzugs can ma// zhal gyi mche ba gtsigs ma
10a3(rgyud 'grel): mgo bo'i phreng ba 'dzin pa mo// sgeg pa'i rgyan rnams dang ni ldan// dbul thod pa'i phreng ba can// yan lag lha rdzas dris nyer byugs// zhabs gdub dpung rgyan rnams dang ldan// lha rdzas me tog phreng bas klubs// rtse bran zlar gnas rdo rje ni// dadral
10a4(rgyud 'grel): bar rtag tu 'dzin pa mo// sku la phyag rgya lnga la sogs// 'jigs dus me lha'i 'od zer can// rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs mdun du// sku la 'bar ba'i phreng ba spro// zhes bya ba ni yum bsgom pa ste// sgrub pa chen po'o// dang po gnas dang bdag dang
10a5(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor bsrung ba la sogs pa nas 'di dag gi bar du ni// dang po sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin lus kyi rang bzhin can no// pad ma'i 'dab ma shar sogs kyi// bar bar du ni rnal 'byor ma// nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i grangs nyid ni// mkha
10a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ma sogs drug drug go/ shar la sogs nas byang gi mthar// mkha' 'gro ma la sogs drug de bzhin// dang po byang nas nub kyi mthar// slar yang lA ma la sogs drug/ nub la sogs nas lho yi mthar// du ma skyes ma la
10b1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i rigs// dang po lho nas shar gyi mthar// de nas gzugs can ma sogs drug/ mkha' 'gro ma dang gzugs can nyid// 'o byad ma dang gzhan bsgyur ma// byis bcas ma dang rjes 'jug ma// byed nag byed sngo can rnams//
10b2(rgyud 'grel): lha ma rnal 'byor dbang byug dang // zab mo thod pa can nag mo// rgyal po bskor ma phye ljang gu/ gang phyir byed dmar rim pas so// dum skyes ma dang dur khrod ma// rnam par nu ma ku ru kA la ma// d+ha ma gar mAr grags ma rnams// byed
10b3(rgyud 'grel): bil kye ser mo// gzugs can 'jigs byed gtsug phud ma// lhor tshugs ral pa can drag mo// lha mo phyed ser phyed nag mo// phyag mtshan la sogs phag mo bzhi// mtshams kyi 'dab ma rnams la ni// bdud rtsi lnga yi snod rnamaso//
10b4(rgyud 'grel): g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis de bzhin du// thod pa'i phreng ba sogs 'dzin ma// g.yon bskor du ni shes bya ste// ri rab steng gi char skyes ma'o// 'di ni thig le'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o// de'i rgyab rdo rje'i 'khor lo ni// sngon nag 'khor lor
10b5(rgyud 'grel): rtsibs rnams kyis// g.yon bskor rim pas bsam bya ba// shes rab thabs dang mnyam sbyor ba'o// de dag kyang mkha' 'gro ma dang rdo rje'i mkha' 'gro'o// lA ma dang sna tshogs mkha' 'gro'o// dum skyes ma dang pad ma'i mkha' 'gro'o/
10b6(rgyud 'grel): gzugs can ma dang rin chen mkha' 'gro'o// rab tu gtum mo dang thod pa'i dum bu can no// gtum pa'i mig can ma dang keng rus chen po'o// 'od ldan ma dang keng rus so// sna chen mo dang mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'o// dpa'
11a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i blo gros ma dang dgra'i lha'o// mi'u thung ma dang 'od dpag tu med pa'o// lang+ka'i dbang phyug ma dang rdo rje 'od do// shing grib ma dang rdo rje'i sku'o// sa srungs ma dang myu gu can no// 'jigs byed mang rdo rje'i ral pa can no// rlung
11a2(rgyud 'grel): shugs can ma dang dpa' bo chen po'o// chang zla dang rdo rje hUM mdzad do// sngo bsangs lha mo dang shin tu bzang po'o// rab tu bzang mo dang rdo rje bzang po'o// rta rna ma dang 'jigs byed chen po'o// bya gdong ma dang mig mi bzang ngo // 'khor lo'i shugs
11a3(rgyud 'grel): can ma dang stobs po che'o// dum skyes ma dang rin chen rdo rje'o// chang 'tsheng ma dang rta mgrin no// 'khor lo'i go cha ma dang na mkha'i snying po'o// shin tu dpa' mo dang he ru ka'o// stobs tshon ma dang pad ma gar gyi dbang phyug go/ 'khor lo sgyur
11a4(rgyud 'grel): ma dang rnam par snang mdzad do// brtson 'grus chen mo dang rdo rje sems dpa'o// gshin rje mo'i bu mo dang stobs po che'o// gshin rje ma dang ye shes mkha' 'gro'o// g.yo byed ma dang blo brtan ma'o// skyug byed ma dang brtan pa'o// gtum
11a5(rgyud 'grel): mo dang thar pa'o// dbyangs can ma dang ye shes// 'dod 'grub ma dang thab so// 'bar ba chen mo dang thugs kyi rdo rje ste/ kha dog 'khor lo ji lta ba'o// phyag bzhi ma la zhal gcig ma// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// cang te'u gri gug de bzhin no//
11a6(rgyud 'grel): sgra grol phyogs kyi gos can ma// sbru la phyag rgya lnga sogs te// rdo rje'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan// yi dgas gdan can drag chen mo// 'khor lo kun gyi rnal 'byor ma// sna tshogs rgyan dang ldan pa dang // de bzhin shes rab thabs ldan pa
11b1(rgyud 'grel): thabs rnams dpa' bo'i rgyun ldan zhing // dpa' mo'i pad na gnas pa'o// lcug ma'i ming ni dpa' mo bzhin// skyes bu'i rtags rnams bya'o// 'khor lo bcu gcig rnams kyis ni// sgo la sogs pa'i yang de bzhi no// snying po'i pad+ma'i b+ha/
11b2(rgyud 'grel): mo rnams// gtso bos bdag po bzhin du bya// 'on kyang bdag po sogs 'khor lor// ji ltar bskal bzang rgyal ba ni// bzhi yis dman pa'i stong phrag gcig/ de rnams thams cad rnam bsgom bya// mtshan ni yon tan dbye bas phye// sprul
11b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sku can bdag nyid do// gang zhig gang gi 'khor lo yi// rnal 'byor ma ni thog mar byung // de yi bcu gnyis shes par bya// kun spyod gnas dang nye gnas ma'o// lhag ma sa ni bcu gsum pa// sgo dang grwa la gnas ma'o// mchod dang bstod
11b4(rgyud 'grel): sogs dus su ni// thog mar rdo rje'i ming shes bya// dpa' bo rnams la yang de bzhi no// de ltar gzugs med khams dang ni// de yang gan su nges par brjod// rab tu dga' ba'i sar grags pa'o// slar yang gnas dang nye gnas sogs// de lta
11b5(rgyud 'grel): sa yi dbus su yang // sa bcu gnyi su 'dod pa yin// de ltar thams cad du shes bya// khams gcig 'dir ni thams cad med// sum cu rtsa drug bshad pa rnams// gtso bo yon tan kun rang bzhin// de ltar khams ni dpa' bo dang // rnal 'byor
11b6(rgyud 'grel): ma yi rang bzhin can// khor yug tu ni sems can rnams// rdzus skyes rigs kyi rim pas so// de yang sum cu rtsa drug gi/ yul dang yul rim pas phye ba'o// zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i 'khor lo// // de nas de yi phyi rol 'chad// slar yang snying
12a1(rgyud 'grel): po'i 'khor lo 'di// dmar sor kha dog la de bzhin// 'khor lo'i rtsibs kyi dbus su no// rdo rje 'chang ma mi bskyod ma// rnam snang rin chen dbang mo dang // pad+ma gar dbang don yod ma// spyan ma dang ni mA ma k+Shi/ gos dkar sgrol
12a2(rgyud 'grel): ma gzugs rdo rje// sgra dang dri dang ro de bzhin// reg dang chos dbyings rdo rje ma// sa snying ma dang mkha' snying mo// phyag ma 'jig rten mgon po ma// sgrib kun sel ma kun bzang mo// rin chen sgrol ma bad+mag mod ma// khro gnyer ri khrod lo ma can//
12a3(rgyud 'grel): gshin mthar byed ma shes mtha' ma// pad mtha' ma bgegs mthar byed ma// mi g.yo ma dang dbyug sngon ma// 'dod rgyal mo dang stobs chen mo// gtsug tor ma dang gnod mdzes mo// kha dog 'khor lo ji bzhin te// zhal la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid
12a4(rgyud 'grel): kun// lhag ma rdo rje'i 'khor lo bzhin// nye ba'i gnasu lha mo rnams// rang 'dra'i thabs dang bsam par bya// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis kyang // gzugs kyi khams dang sa dri med// zla ba'i gling du 'dod pa yin// zhes bya ba ni snying po'i 'khor
12a5(rgyud 'grel): lo ste gnyis pa'o// de nas de'i rgyab yon tan kun// zhes bya'i 'khor lo dkar dmar ba// rdo rje'i rtsibs kyi dbus sbyin pa// pho nya ma mchog sum cu drug/ bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u rigs ma// dmangs mo gtum mo khyi 'tshong ma// g.yung mo gar
12a6(rgyud 'grel): mthong pa can// nyab mo dang smyig gar ma// dung mkhan ma dang thag mo// khur ba mkhan mo shing bzo ma// phreng ba khra ba chos ma dang // srin bal byed ma pho nya mo// rus zos ma dang rtsis mkhan ma// chang 'tshong ldum ra'i gnyer ba mo// rgyal pos
12b1(rgyud 'grel): bkrabs ma shin pa mo// sau rtsi 'tshong bar byod mo dang // gsog mgar mo dang lcags mgar mau// nor bu brgyud ma nags pa mo// kla kl-i oM Di tshong ba mo// rdo bzo ma dang zhi las ma// kau lpags mo ste rnal 'byor ma// 'di rnams 'khor lo'i kha dog
12b2(rgyud 'grel): go/ lhag ma thams cad snying po yi// 'khor lo ji bzhin shes par bya// 'dir ni zhing du shes bya ste// 'dod khams rigs kun bdag nyid dang // dkar po'i gling zhes bya bar bshad// rang gi shes rab thabs bdag nyid// 'o byed pa yis
12b3(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin// de yi phyi rol khyams rnams la// bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas rnams// stong du bzhi yis nyung ba ste// dkyil 'khor rim pa bzhi po la// nyis brgya bzhi bcu rtsa dgu dgu/ bskal pa bzang po'i mdo nyid na// stong tshang ba
12b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs te/ 'khor ba 'jigs dang gser thub dang 'od srungs rnams ni sngar gshegs pas 'khor du mi 'os pa'i phyir dang / shAkya thub pa ni mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rang nyid yin pa'i phyir// bzhi po ma gtogs pa'o// lha'i snam bu'i shar nas/
12b5(rgyud 'grel): g.yon bskor du rim pas thams cad kyang pad+ma dang / zla ba la bzhugs pa dka' thub kyi cha byad can sku mdog sna tshogs pa rnams te/ de yang mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po byams pa dang / seng+ge dang / rab gsal dang / thub pa dang / me
12b6(rgyud 'grel): tog dang / me tog gnyis pa dang / spyan legs dang / ded dpon dang / lag chen dang / stobs chen dang / rgyu skar rgyal po dang / rtsi sman dang / snyan pa'i tog dang / 'od chen dang / grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par snang mdzad dang / nyi ma'i snying
13a1(rgyud 'grel): bau dang / zla ba dang / 'od 'phro dang / 'od bzang dang / mya ngan med dang / skar rgyal dang / rab gsal dang / phreng thogs dang / yon tan 'od dang / don gzigs dang / mar me dang / mthu ldan dang / sman pa dang / nges pa dang / mdzod
13a2(rgyud 'grel): spu dang / brtan ldan dang / lha'i dpal dang / gdul dka' dang / yon tan rgyal mtshan dang / sgra gcan dang / tshogs ldan dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / tshig ldan dang / mi 'gying ba dang / 'od mdzad dang / lhun chen dang / rdo rje dang / sdom bcan/
13a3(rgyud 'grel): dang / mi snyems pa dang / rin po che dang / pad mo'i spyan dang / stobs kyi sde dang / me tog 'od zer dang / ye shes rgyas dang / gzi chen dang / tshangs pa dang / 'od dpag med dang / klu sbyin dang / brtan gshegs dang / don yod mthong dang / brtson
13a4(rgyud 'grel): 'grus sbyin dang / bzang skyong dang / dga' bo dang / 'chi med dang / seng ge'i rgyal mtshan dang / rgyal ba dang / chos ldan dang / mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po dang / kha lo sgyur ba dang / dgyes gshegs dang / chu lha dang / yon tan lag
13a5(rgyud 'grel): dang / spos kyi glang po dang / rnam par gzigs dang / 'brug sgra dang / legs sems dang / yid bzang dang / dri med dang / zla ba dang / grags chen dang / gtsug na nor bu dang / drag shul dang / seng+ge'i stobs dang / ljon pa dang / rnam par
13a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba chen po dang / shes rab brtsegs pa dang / legs gnas dang / blo gros dang / yan lag skyes dang / blo mtha' yas dang / gzugs bzang dang / mkhyen ldan dang / 'od zer dang / brtul zhugs brtan dang / bkra shis dang /
13b1(rgyud 'grel): bden pa'i tog dang / pad ma dang / sred med kyi bu dang / lag bzang dang / ye shes 'byung gnas dang / yon tan 'od 'phro dang / tshangs sbyin dang / rin chen 'byung gnas dang / lha'i me tog dang / don legs sems dpa' dang /
13b2(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi dbang phyug dang / blo gros grags pa dang / spobs pa brtsegs dang / rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang / phan par bzhed pa dang / rnam par rol por ldan pa dang / mun pa dang bral ba dang / sgra gcan lha dang / ri bo'i rgyal mtshan dang / tshags
13b3(rgyud 'grel): chen 'od dang / rin chen snying po dang / shin tu mthor gshegs dang / skar rgyal dang / ru rings dang / yon tan grags dang / 'od ldan nyi zla dang / nyi ma'i 'od dang / slar mkhan dang / seng+ge tog dang / dus pa khyen mal po dang / dpal
13b4(rgyud 'grel): gyi snying po dang / srid mthar gzigs pa dang / glog gi 'od dang / gser gyi ri bo dang / seng+ges byin pa dang / gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / mchog dga' grags pa dang / brtsod 'grus brtan pa dang / grags rdzogs
13b5(rgyud 'grel): dang / bsnyengs pa bral dang / mchod 'os lha dang / sgron ma chen po dang / 'jig rten 'od dang / spros dri zhim pa dang / yon mchog dang 'dzin dang / mun pa dang bral ba ng+ge'i 'gram pa dang / rin chen grags pa dang / skyon rab tu
13b6(rgyud 'grel): zhi ba dang / bdud rtsi 'chang ba dang / mi'i zla ba dang / shin tu gzigs dang / rab tu brgyan pa dang / nor bu'i 'od dang / ri bo brtsegs pa'i tog dang / don nges ldan dang / tshe sbyin dang / rin chen 'byung gnas dang / skye dbang mtshungs dang / stob
14a1(rgyud 'grel): kyis gshegs pa dang / blo gnas pa dang / gdugs mdzes dang / gtso bo dang / shin tu 'phags pa dpal dang / seng ge'i sgra dang / rnam par rol ldan dang / klu'i 'od dang / me tog gi ri bo dang / klu dga' dang spos kyi
14a2(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug dang / shin tu grags pa dang / stobs lha dang / yon tan phreng bar ldan pa dang / klu'i lag pa dang / mig brgyan pa dang / legs par sbyangs pa'i blo dang / zil gyis gnon pa'i ye shes dang / mtha' yas spyan dang / bden par
14a3(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa dang / nyi ma'i 'od dang / nges pa'i blo dang / mtha' yas pa'i gzugs dang / rnam par snang mdzad dang / rin chen tog dang / the tshom spangs pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / don yod rnam par gnon po dang / rtogs mdzad
14a4(rgyud 'grel): dang / me tog rgyal mtshan dang / dbang rgyal po dang / gzi brjid che dang / don mdzad gzigs dang / grags pa mtha' yas dang / rin chen lha dang / don gnas mkhyen dang / dman min grags pa dang / mya ngan med pa dang / dri ma bral ba
14a5(rgyud 'grel): dang / tshangs lha dang / sa'i dbang phyug dang / me tog spyan dang / rnam par 'byed pa'i sku dang / chos kyi 'od dang / kun rnam gzigs dang / yon tan 'od gsal dang / zla ba'i zhal dang / rin chen 'od dang / rin chen tog dang / grags pa'i bla
14a6(rgyud 'grel): ma dang / 'od byed dang / gzi brjid dpag med dang / dus mkhyen dang / seng+ge'i sku dang / mkhas blo dang / rgyal bar dka' dang / yon tan phung po dang / zla ba'i tog dang / mthu thob pa dang / mthu rtsal mtha' yas pa dang / zla ba dang / dri ma med pa
14b1(rgyud 'grel): dang / don rnams thams cad gzigs pa dang / dpa' bo dang / 'byor par ldan pa dang / bsod nams dang / sgron ma dang / yon tan 'phro dang / blo yangs pa dang / legs skyes dang / nor lha dang / yid gnyis spong ba dang / 'dzin pa dang sa med dang /
14b2(rgyud 'grel): mchog sred dang / choms med dang / mi gnas pa dang / bder gnas dang / tshogs can gtso bo dang / 'gro ba'i 'od zer dang / phal chen dang / rgyal ba dang / gzi brjod mtha' yas dang / don gyi blo gros dang / sman pa'i rgyal po dang tha ba
14b3(rgyud 'grel): spangs dang / rims nad med pa dang / legs sbyin dang / grags byin dang / me tog byin dang / skyes bus byin dang / rdo rje'i sde dang / phal chen byin pa dang / zhi ba'i blo gros dang / spobs pa'i glang po dang / sred med kyi bu dang / nges pa dang / pi tshug
14b4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / nyi zla dang / glog gi tog rnamaso// de yi phyi rol zlum por sbyin// ri mo gnyis ni gnag dang sngo// sgo dang rta babs kha khyer dang // dra ba dra pa phyed pas mdzes// shar gyi sgo yi dbus su yang // mkha' 'gro ma 'dra'i khwa gdong ma/ rgyang du/
14b5(rgyud 'grel): 'ug pa'i gdong can ma// nub tu khyi gdong can ma dang // lho ru phag gri gdong can te// kha dog lA ma sogs 'dra mchog/ me dang bden bral rlung dang ni// dbang ldan mtshams na gnas pa mo// gshin rje mche ba pho nya mo// mche gtsigs 'joms
14b6(rgyud 'grel): pa rim ji bzhin// kha dog gnyis gnyis mnyam par bya// zhal ni rje su mthun rim pas// dkyil 'khor bzhi po thams cad kyi// shar dang byang dang nub dang ni// lho yi sa gzhi rtag pa ru// gnag dang sngo dang ljang dang dmar// ser po yi ni mdo
15a1(rgyud 'grel): tu bya// lhan skyes dkyil 'khor de bzhin du// gang phyir 'khor lo rim pa bzhin// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sprul pa// mjug tu bya'o rim ji bzhin// 'khor lo gnyis po ri mo gsum khagasum pa la ni ri mo
15a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi// bzhi par ri mo lnga'i bdag nyid// dur khrod kun nas rim pas te// phyi rol la sogs sa gzhi ni// zlum po'i dbyibs su bya bar 'dod// 'khor lo rim pa lnga'i bdag nyid// gru bzhi pa la kun tu 'bar// 'dod pa'i yon tan snam bu
15a3(rgyud 'grel): la// brgyad gnyis lha mos mchod byed pa// dkyil 'khor bzhi po rnams la'o// de la lhan skyes 'khor lo yi// dur khrod gnas rnams bshang bya ste// gtum drag tshang tshing de bzhin du// 'bar bas 'khrigs pa keng rus can// 'jig
15a4(rgyud 'grel): sde shar la sogs pa yi// phyogasu g.yon bskor yongasu gnas// aDa Da ba rab rgod dbang ljon du// dpal gyi nags ni sreg zar te// mun pa drag po bden bral du// rlung du kI li ki li sgrogs// dur khrod drag po'i gzugs rnams ni//
15a5(rgyud 'grel): ro langs 'byung po ce spyang sgra// rim pa 'di yis gnas pa ste// dur khrod brgyad po rnamasu yang // shing dang phyogs skyong klu dbang ste// shir shing khyab nas kang ke li// tsU tA'i shing dang n+ya g+ho d+ha// de bzhin ka rany+dza ka nyid// la ta baR+Sha pArbi ba
15a6(rgyud 'grel): dbang po nor sbyin de bzhin gyi// klu dbang dang ni gshin rje'i bdag/ dbang ldan de nas sreg za dang // srin po'i dbang po rlung bdag po// nor rgyas 'jog po de bzhin du// stobs kyi rgyu dang pad mo nyid// pad chen hu lu hu lu dang // rigs ldan dang
15b1(rgyud 'grel): ni dung skyong dang // sgrogs pa dang ni 'ur sgyogs dang // drag po 'khyil ba 'thug de bzhin// gang ba char 'bebs gtum po ste// 'di rnams sbyin gyi bdag po'o// 'dir ni dur khrod thams cad la// rdo rje phreng ba rnam par byin// thams cad
15b2(rgyud 'grel): kyang 'dir de bzhin bya// phyi dang nang du 'dod pa yin zhes bya ba ni gsum pa yon tan gyi 'khor lo'o// de nas de'i phyi na mkha' yis// 'khor lo 'dam skyes sngon po mtshungs// sum cu drugs rtsibs dbus su yang // mkha' spyod rnal
15b3(rgyud 'grel): 'byor ma 'di rnams// mi 'am ci mo dri za mo// hUM ru k+Sha mA pA Da ba ma de bzhin du// pi wang gling pu mu kun da ma dang // rdza rnga mA dang nges par gaH/ ri ma dang // cha lang ma dang shI lan dri ki ma// glu ma ka ra Da dang ta ma Da mchog dang // gar ma
15b4(rgyud 'grel): sgesgog mo D+hak+ka ma dang ni// tA li shar Na mo rje chen mo// mo dri ma dang rgyud can ma dang mA tu ma// nA la bA mo de bzhin rnam pa ki/ Da ma ru ma dang Du Na ru ka ma dang de bzhin du// zangs dung ma dang rA dung ma de bzhin// b+hu kI ma dang dril bu ma
15b5(rgyud 'grel): dang dril chung ma// g.yer kA ma dang de bzhin Da ko li ma dang // dung ma dang ni dbyangs ldan ma de bzhin// 'khor ma mchog gi dbang phyug ma// kha dog sna tshogs bkra ba 'am// yang na 'khor lo'i kha dog gro/ nye ba'i zhing na gnas pa mo//
15b6(rgyud 'grel): ku sha'i gling na gnas ma mchog/ mkha' la spyod pa'i rigasu byon// gling 'di la ni yang dag gnas// sa ni 'od 'phro can de dang // rang rang gnas sogs zhing can ma'o// yang na Da ma ru kha T+wAM ga/ 'di ni slar yang spangs nas su//
16a1(rgyud 'grel): rang rang mtshan ma so so'i tshul// ji ltar 'dod par bya ba'o// 'khor lo kun gyi cod pan la// rang gi bdag pos bya ba yin// 'dir ni shes rab thabs bdag nyid// rigs ldan bdag nyid rigs can ma'o// ji ltar rgyan
16a2(rgyud 'grel): la sogs mang po// lhag ma sngon bzhin bya ba yin// dkyil 'khor kun tu spyan gsum dang // phyogs kyi gos 'chang rje 'gro ma'o// zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'i 'khor lo ste 'khor lo gnyis pa'i dang po'o// // de'i phyi rol rlung 'khor lo// sngon
16a3(rgyud 'grel): po sna tshogs pa yi mdog/ rdo rje'i rtsibs dbus spyir bya ba// rnal 'byor ma rnams rim ji bzhin// na mkha'i snying po las gzhan ming // blo dang ldan pas shes par bya// mkha' lding dang mo bkra ba mo// bya rog bya dkar sreg pa mo// rma bya zangs kyi
16a4(rgyud 'grel): gcus phud ma// gung bu la'i 'jam pa mo// phug ron bya rog chen po dang // ga di ni dang go ma srig/ ne tso sngags ma bzhad ma dang / khya rgod ngug pa mchil pa mo// shing byi ru mo dang ngu pa mo/ khIk+Sha ri rdzi ka bi/ so bya mo dang byil mo// lcug mI mgrin dang sA ri mo/
16a5(rgyud 'grel): mo gar gum lha can ma// bA Di ri kA dza g+ha mo// hor mo ka ka mo de bzhin// da da dA ri mo ri dgas dgra/ de ltar rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo// 'khor lo'i sa gzhi gang 'dra'i mdog/ yang na rang rang la shes bya// phyag sogs de bzhin sngon dang mtshud
16a6(rgyud 'grel): thams da shes rab thabs bdag nyid// 'jas pa la ni gnas ma mchog/ sbyang dka'i sar ni shes bya ste// mi 'am ci'i gling mar 'dod// 'khor lo 'di ni sgong skyes dang // yon tan gsum gyi dbye ba can// gsum gyi bdag nyid gsum sa yi// 'khor
16b1(rgyud 'grel): lang gsher skyes gzugs can// bzhi pa mngal skyes zhes bya ba// 'khor lo gsum gyi bdag nyid 'dod ces bya ba ni rlung gi 'khar lo s+ho/ 'khor lo gnyis pa'o gnyis pa'o// de nas phyi rol gyi bshang bya// 'khor lho sa yo mong can mchog/
16b2(rgyud 'grel): kha dog ser po'i rang bzhin la// sum cu drug rtsibs rnams kyis sbas// rnal 'byor ma ni sum cu drug/ sa sbyong ma rnams rim ji bzhin// seng ge stag mo b+ham+b+hi ri bong ma// glang chen ro dgas byi la mo// ba dang ba he mo rnga mo// ce spyang mo dang bsre
16b3(rgyud 'grel): mo 'bri// byi la bong mo b+hi Di ma// ra mo lug mo rim pa bzhin// khyi mo phag mo dang mo dang // DaN+Da rI ma~M dz+nyA ma de bzhin// dri mo dang ni sgeg mo dang // nags ma dang ni khyim chen mo// bya rog chen mo kha sgo mo// sbrul mo bkra mo rnga ma dang // sre mo
16b4(rgyud 'grel): zangs mo phug pa mo// grong na gnas pa ma mchog go// de ltar 'khor lo'i mdog bzhin nam// yang ni rang rang kha dog go// lha mo shes rab thabs bdag nyid// nye ba'i 'dun sar gnas pa mo// mngon du gyur pa'i sa nyid dang // doni shes
16b5(rgyud 'grel): rab pha rol phyin// krung krung gling du gnas pa mo// mtshon tsha la sogs sngon bzhi no// lus ni bud med rnam pa'i gzugs// gdong pa rang gi dngos por 'dod// de'i phyi bskal bzang sangs rgyas rnams// sngar gyi rim pas bsam par bya//
16b6(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa dang dpal sgras dang / ye shes nyi ma dang / don grub dang / lhun po brtsegs pa dang / dgra 'dul dang / pad+ma dang / dgra bcom grags pa dang / ye shes 'gros dang / nyon mongs bral dang / 'dum bu dang / spros bzangs dang / yul
17a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor rangs dang / lha grags dang / srid mtha' gzigs dang / zla ba dang / sgra gcan dang / rin chen zla ba dang / seng ge'i rgyal mtshan dang / bsam gtan dgyes dang / rdzogs ldan dang / rnam pa grol ba dang / yon tan
17a2(rgyud 'grel): rin chen dang / dgra bcom grags pa dang / pad ma'i ngos dang / mdzod spu ldan dang / spobs pa grags pa dang / rdo rje nor bu dang / tshe dpag med dang / nor bu bkod pa dang / dbang chen dang / yon tan 'byung gnas dang / lhun po grags dang /
17a3(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer bcu pa dang / ma smad pa dang / glang po'i 'gros dang / yid du 'thad pa dang / rin chen zla ba dang / zhi ba dang / rab gsal rgyal po dang / kha lo sgyur dang / dga' ba'i dbang phyug dang / gtsug na rin po che dang / bsnyengs bral dang / rin chen
17a4(rgyud 'grel): snying po dang / zla ba'i zhal dang / dri ma med par grags pa dang / zhi ba'i gzi brjid dang / dga' ba'i tog dang / sgra gcan lha dang / na tshod bzang po dang / lha dag dga' dang / rin chen phung po dang / mdzes par gshegs pa dang / seng ge'i phyogs
17a5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / shin tu mthor gshegs dang / skye ba'i dbang po dang / blo gros bzang po dang / 'jig rten 'od dang / rin chen gzi brjing dang / skal ldan shing rta dang / kun tu rgyal ba dang / dga' ba bkod pa dang / stegs mdzad dang / spos kyi glang
17a6(rgyud 'grel): po dang / blo gros 'od 'phro dang / ri bo'i rgyal mtshan dang / spos bzang dang / chos brtan dang / gzi brjid drag shul can dang / chos kyi nor bu dang / bzang po byin dang / bdo gshegs zla ba dang / tshangs dbyangs dang / seng ge'i zla ba dang / dpal
17b1(rgyud 'grel): dang / legs par skyes dang / thub pa med pa'i tshogs dang / grags pa'i bshes gnyen dang / bden pa dang / dka' thub chen po dang / lhun po'i 'od zer dang / yon tan brtsegs pa dang / mchod pa grags pa dang / chos grags pa dang / sbyin pa'i
17b2(rgyud 'grel): 'od dang / glog 'byon dang / bden par gsung dang / 'tshe byed dang / na tshod bzang po dang / leDa pa'i tshogs can dang / rnam par nges pa'i blo gros dang / srid mtha' nor bu'i spos dang / rgyal bas dgyes dang / seng+ge'i 'od zer dang / rnam par snang mdzad dang / grang
17b3(rgyud 'grel): mchog dang / thugs rab gzhungs dang / nor bu zla ba dang / drag shul 'od zer dang / brtul zhugs thub med dang / 'gro bas mchod pa dang / nor bu'i tshogs dang / 'jig rten bla ma dang / glang chen dang / seng ge dang / zla ba dang / rin chen 'od zer
17b4(rgyud 'grel): dang / sgra gcan sgra dang / yon tan rgya mtsho dang / 'od zer ldan pa dang / rab tu zhi ba'i stobs dang / 'jig rten bzang po dang / mya ngan med pa dang / shugs bcu pa dang / stobs la dgyes pa dang / mthu'i dpal dang / mthu thob dang / mthu chen dang
17b5(rgyud 'grel): yon tan snying po dang / bden par spyod pa dang / dge tsho ga rgyal po dang / skar rgyal dang / 'od zer chen po dang / glog gi 'od dang / yon tan rgya chen dang / rin po che dang / dpal 'od dang / bdud 'dul dang / go cha bgos pa dang / seng+ga'i phyag dang / me
17b6(rgyud 'grel): tog bzang po dang / rin chen mthon po dang / rgya mtsho dang / sa 'dzin dang / don gyi blo mnga' ba dang / yon tan brtsegs pa dang / yon tan gyi tshogs dang / rin po che'i me dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'jig rten gyi zla ba dang / dbyangs snyan
18a1(rgyud 'grel): dang / tshangs pa'i tog dang / tshogs cher gtso ba dang / seng ge'i stobs dang / drag can gyi byin pa dang / chos kyi dbang phyug dang / gzi bad+hi pa dang du 'ong zer chen po dang / rin chen grags pa dang / tshogs can gsal ba dang / grags
18a2(rgyud 'grel): mtha' yas dang / 'od zer don yod pa dang / lha'i drang srong dang / skye ba'i dbang po dang / dge 'dun brtan pa dang / phyogs bzang dang / rtog dang / yul 'khor me tog dang / chos kyi blo gros dang / rlung gi shugs ltar gshegs pa dang / legs pa'i
18a3(rgyud 'grel): grags pa dang / snang ldan dang / lha'i tshogs dang / yon tan srungs dang / don gyi blo gros dang / bsnyengs pa med pa dang / grags pa brtan pa dang / 'od gnas mtshungs pa dang / nor bu'i zhabs dang / thar pa'i gzi brjid dang / ngos bzang dang / blo
18a4(rgyud 'grel): bzangs dang / kun tu gzi brjid dang / ye shes mchog dang / tshangs par gnas dang / bden par gsungs dang / blo bzang dang / stobs byin dang / sang+ge'i stabs dang / me tog gi tog dang / ye shes 'byung gnas dang / me tog byin dang / yon tan
18a5(rgyud 'grel): snying po dang / rin chen grags pa dang / grags pa rmad du phyung ba dang / mi tshugs pa dang / bsnyengs pa med pa dang / nyi ma'i 'od dang / tshangs par gshegs pa dang / lha'i mthu rtsal dang / ye shes dgyes dang / lha'i bden pa dang / nor bu'i snying po
18a6(rgyud 'grel): dang / yon tan grags pa dang / ye shes dpal dang / bcings pa med pa dang / brtul zhugs brtan pa dang / lha'i gzi brjid dang / tshangs thub dang / brtul zhugs dka' thub dang / 'od zer phung po dang / gzi brjid che ba dang / tsam pa ka dang / dga'
18b1(rgyud 'grel): mdzad dang / tshogs can bzang po dang / dbang po'i rgyal mtshan dang / dgyes pa chen po dang / sna ma'i me tog 'od dang / tshogs can 'od dang / spyan mdzad dang / mdangs 'gro dang / don legs nges pa dang / khyu mchog dang / lag bzang dang / 'od zer chen
18b2(rgyud 'grel): podang / sam pas byin dang / bsod nams 'od dang / rin chen dbyangs dang / rdo rje'i sde dang / 'byor ldan dang / sed+mo'i stobs dang / d+hi med spyan dang / 'od srungs dang / blo gas la dang / ye shes 'gros dang / gzi brjid drug shul can dang / 'od zer chen
18b3(rgyud 'grel): po dang / nya ma'i 'od dang / dri ma med pa'i 'od dang / gzi brjid rnam par 'byed pa dang / khengs pa med pa dang / sbrang rtsi zhal dang / zla ba'i 'od dang / glog 'byin dang / rab tu zhi bar gshegs pa dang / mi 'khrugs pa dang / dgra bcom grags pa dang /
18b4(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi yon tan dang / zhing bzang po dang / bkod pa'i rgyal po dang / mngon par 'phags pa dang / sbyin sreg 'od 'phro dang / pad ma'i dpal dang / rin chen bkod pa dang / shin tu bzang po dang / rin chen mchog dang / thugs shin tu gzhungs pa dang /
18b5(rgyud 'grel): mtshos byin dang / tshangs pa'i tog rnamaso// shar dang byang dang nub dang ni// lho yi sgro ru shes bya ba// tshangs pa dbang phyug chen po ma// gzhon nu khyab 'jug ma de bzhin// phag mo dbang ma gtum mo dang // dpal chen mo ni grwa rnams// sgo ru gzugs
18b6(rgyud 'grel): dang mtshan ma ni// mkha' 'gro ma sogs bzhin du grags// grwa ru brtan ma la sogs bzhin// shes bya 'dir ni ri mo gsum// sku gsung thugs kyi chos rnams// chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu mdzes// dur khrod rnams ni brjod bya ste// mo
19a1(rgyud 'grel): yi 'khor lo'i dbus su ni// gsod dang kun tu skrag byed dang // 'jigs pa che dang 'jigs byed de// drag po'i dur khrod de bzhin du// g.yon bskor du ni rnam par dgod// skrag byed dang ni sdang byed dang // lcags byed dang
19a2(rgyud 'grel): ni rengs byed slar// dbang ldan la sogs gra la'o// shing ni rim pas sbyin bya ste// go yu stan nA lir// se 'bru bil ba'i shing de nas// skyu ru bi dz+ha rag sha'i shing // rim pa ji bzhin rnam par dgod// dbang mo gshin rje ma chu mo// gnod
19a3(rgyud 'grel): sbyin 'byung mo drang song ma// srin mo rlung gi chung ma ste// 'jig rten skyong mo sbyin par byed// klu mo srin mo thams cad ni// 'dir ni rnam pa kun tu sbyin// de ltar dkyil 'khor 'khor bshad la// phun sum tshogs pa thams cad sbyin// las
19a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi rjes mthun sku mdog can// der ni gtso bo bsgom par bya// ces bya ba ni 'khor lo gsum pa'i dkyil 'khor la rim pa gnyis dang bcas pa'o// / de nas phyi rol slar yang 'dir// me yi 'khor lo dag gis bshad// kha dog
19a5(rgyud 'grel): dmar po 'bar chen po// sum cu drug rtsibs rnams mchog la// rnal 'byor ma slar dgod bya ba// lha sogs rigs las byung ma ste// lha mo klu mo gnod sbyin mo// 'byung po ngo bo tsam po'o// de kun gsungs pa 'di ni ci// lha yi rigs
19a6(rgyud 'grel): 'byung bshad par bya// ma dang chung ma sring mo dang // bu mo sring mo'i bu mo dang // pha yi sring mo de dang ni// zhang po yi ni chung ma dang // chung ma'i spun zla ma dang ni// de nyid kyi ni pha yi ma// chung ma yi ni phye ma dang // ma yi ma dang gnyen mo dang //
19b1(rgyud 'grel): ma yi spyan zla spyan tha'i bu mo dang // rang gi phyi mo'i spun zla dang // spyan zla'i bu mo do'i bu mo// pa yi ma dang phyi mo dang // khu bo yi ni chung ma dang // bu mo'i bu yi chung ma dang // slar yang chung ma'i spun zla dang / rang pa'i sring mo bu mo dang // de nyid kyis
19b2(rgyud 'grel): ni rang rigs skyes// spun zla'i chung ma bu mo dang // bu nyid kyi chung ma dang // bu mo'i khyo yi ma yi ni// bu nyid kyi ni sgyug mo dang // bu mo'i bu mor yang dag bshad// pho nya sum cu drug rnamaso// kha dog dmar por yang dag grags// mtshon
19b3(rgyud 'grel): cha la sogs sngar dang mtshungs// sa ni ring du spong nyid dang // drag po'i gling du gnas pa mo// 'du bar rtag tu shes bya ste// shes rab thabs bdag ngo bo can// nus pa'i 'khor lor 'dir rtag tu// shes bya rang 'dra'i mdzes pa mo// kun
19b4(rgyud 'grel): tu rdo rje'i phreng la sogs// lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog pa yis// g.yon dang g.yas pa'i lag pa yis// 'dir ni ma phod byed pa yin// phyugs rnams kyi ni sha thams cad// kun tu son nas dbul bar bya// btung ba rnam pa sna
19b5(rgyud 'grel): tshogs dbul// bldag bya sna tshogs nyid de bzhin// rang rang stan la langs nas ni// bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa mchod// slar yang 'ongs nas 'khor lo yi// mchod pa bcu gnyis rnams la'o// zhes bya ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i me'i
19b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo dang po'o// // de nas de yi phyi rol bshad// chu yi 'khor lo rdzu 'phrul che// mdog dkar sum cu drug rtsibs la// rnal 'byor ma ni rim pas bsgom// ma ka ra mo ru sbal nya// sbal mo ru sbal chu sra mo// sdig nag skar
20a1(rgyud 'grel): mA sa// stsa la k+Sha rmA gdang ma dang // mag rnam sus+yA rmA/ d+hu d+hA dang blug gdung ma dang // nu sa mA mr-i nga na hU~Md ma dang // glang nan ma dang stug nA Sh+Ta stu ma/ tshwa sbrul ma dang drung ma
20a2(rgyud 'grel): bu mo/ nya phyis ma dang nor bu dzaM gur ma dong // lI sa mo dang drung ngu ram kets+tsha Da/ pha Ta ka mo dA bAka ma grom mo/ sh+lo ma dang sha sbrang me ka lA ma// lha yi gtso mo mchog rnamaso// de ltar kha dog ring bzhin no// dkar mo 'am rang rang rigs skyes
20a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// gdong pa rang rang gzugs kyis te// rnal 'byor ma'i ri ma ji bzhino// nye ba'i 'du ba nyid dang ni// sa ni mi g.yo ba mchog/ dzan+ta'i gling du gnas par ni// shes bya mtshon cha sngon bzhi no// yang na gang ba'i rigs sogs kyi// mi rnams su ma cu
20a4(rgyud 'grel): drug lta'o// gnas sogs rim pa de rnams// mi mo dngos yang dag bya// dzam+b+ha'i gling 'di de yis ni// drum bu bcu gnyis kyis brgyan pa'o// ba tshA zhes bya'i rgya mtshor ni// ba tshwa zhes bya'i rgya mtshor na// de ru gtogs pa'i skye bo rnams// drod gshe
20a5(rgyud 'grel): skyes dang 'du 'phrod las// skyes pa mngal nas skye bar bsam// 'khor lo 'di ni drod gsher skyes// me yi 'khor lo mngal skyeso// mtshan nyid thams cad yongs rdzogs pa'i// shes rab thabs bdag nyid rang ngo zhes bya ba ni chu'i 'khor lo'i skye
20a6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis par// / de nas de yi phyi rol 'chad// kun nas ye shes 'khor lo'o// sum cu drug rtsibs sna tshogs mdog/ lha min mo'i rigs rim pa dang // til mchog ma dang phul du bde// lha yi bu mo dga' chen mo// dga' dang dgar grag/
20b1(rgyud 'grel): padad+ma chen ma// dum can sna tshogs glang chen ma// gzugs chen ma dang gzugs mdzes ma// 'dod chags rnams sgeg bde ba mo// me tog 'dod ma ut+pal dkar// ut+pal sngo dang mdzes ma dang // 'dod chags ma dang 'dod chags che//
20b2(rgyud 'grel): rol grags ma dang rol chen ma// myos ma dang ni myos dga' ma// 'dod pa mo dang 'don chen mo// de las zung dang bde ldan pa// mthun mchog ma dang byams pa mo// skal bzang ldan ma skal bzang mo// dma' ba mo dang zhum pa mo// skyes
20b3(rgyud 'grel): gzugs mar ni grags pa ste// rnal 'byor ma yi gtso mo mchog/ thams cad shes rab thabs bdag nyid// rnam pa sna tshogs mdog de bzhin// phyag dang mtshon cha sngon bzhin shes// legs pa'i blo gros sa de bzhin// dur khrod rin po
20b4(rgyud 'grel): cher snang ba// rang 'byung bde ba byed pa po// de phyir longs spyod rdzogs sku'o// de nas de yi phyi rol tu// zla gdugs dang / 'od 'phro ba dang / dri med rgyal po dang / ye shes grags pa dang / kun tu rgyal ba dang / yon tan 'od dang / sgra grags dang //
20b5(rgyud 'grel): zla ba rgyas pa dang / pad ma'i 'od zer dang / brtul zhugs bzang po dang / sgron ma'i rgyal po dang / glog gi tog dang / 'od zer rgyal po dang / skar mkhan dang / grags pa rdzogs ldan dang / pad+ma'o snying po dang / rgyal dang / spyan mdzes dang / rnyog
20b6(rgyud 'grel): pa med pa'i don dang / drag shul bde ba dang / bsod nams gzi brjid dang / mthu rtsal can dang / thogs pa med pa'i blo dang / sgra gcan lha dang / ye shes phung po dang / kha lo sgyur dang / skye dbang mtshungs dang / me tog gi tog dang / sgra gcan
21a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin dang / rtsi sman chen po dang / rgyu skar rgyal po dang / sman pa'i rgyal po dang / bsod nams glang po dang / gcod par mdzad pa dang / rnam par grags pa'i rgyal po dang / nyi ma'i 'od zer dang / chos kyi mdzod dang / blo gros
21a2(rgyud 'grel): bzang po dang / yon tan mtshungs dang / rdo rje'i sde dang / shes rab brtsegs dang / legs par gnas pa dang / blo sbyangs dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / yon tan mchog dang / 'brug sgra dbyangs dang / mngon par shes pa'i tog dang / tog
21a3(rgyud 'grel): gi 'od dang / dge ba dang / tshangs pa dang / skyes mchog dang / spyan sdug pa dang / klus byin pa dang / bden pa'i tog dang / rgyan pa dang / zhum pa med pa'i dbyangs dang / rin chen 'od dang / dbyangs byin dang / seng ge dang / 'od zer sna tshogs
21a4(rgyud 'grel): dang / ye shes dpa' bo dang / pad ma'i phung po dang / me tog rgyas pa dang / mthu stsal stabs dang / bsod nams phung po dang / gzugs mchog dang / skar mkhan dang / zla ba'i sgron ma dong / gzi brjid phung po dang / byang chub rgyal po dang
21a5(rgyud 'grel): mi bzad pa dang / mngon rtogs spyan dang / yan lag rgyas pa dang / yul 'khor dang / shes rab dang / mchog dang / gzi brjid tshim mdzad dang / shes rab 'byin dang / 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang / chags pa med pa'i mdzod dang / gtso bos
21a6(rgyud 'grel): byin dang / gtso bo dang / ye shes mthu rtsal dang / 'od 'phro can dang / dbang po dang / shugs 'chang dang / skar rgyal dang / 'od bzang dang / grags pa byin dang / gzugs bzang po dang / rgyal po dang / don grub pa dang / seng+ge'i sde dang / nor bu'i
21b1(rgyud 'grel): lha dang / grags pa dang / rgyal ba dang / rgyal chen snying po dang / bsod nams 'od zer dang / smad 'dod pa dang / sgron ma'i rgyal po dang / ye shes brtsegs pa dang / lha mchog dang / sa bdag dang / rnam grol brnyes dang / gtsug gi gser
21b2(rgyud 'grel): dang / sgra gcan bzang po dang / thub dka' dang / thub gsal dang / zla ba'i 'od zer dang / gser gyi 'od zer dang / legs byin dang / lha'i yon tan dbang po dang / chos kyi gdugs dang / bsod nams lag dang / chags med dang / ye shes
21b3(rgyud 'grel): gya nom dang / blo zhib mo dang / gzi byin thams cad dang / rtsi sman dang / rnam grol tog dang / 'od kyi mdzod dang / ye shes rgyal po dang / 'jigs mdzad dang / chu bo spong ba dang / thogs med grags pa dang / bden pa'i phung po dang / dbyangs
21b4(rgyud 'grel): snyan dang / ri dbang mtshungs dang / chos rtsegs dang / thar pa'i gzi byin dang / legs 'dzin dang / rab tu zhi ba'i sku dang / yid du 'ong ba'i gsung dang / blo sbyangs pa dang / chu lha dang / 'gro bas mchod dang / seng ge'i logs dang / chos kyi
21b5(rgyud 'grel): mthu rtsal dang / bskal pa bzang po dang / mi 'khrugs pa'i mdog dang / gzi brjid rgyal po dang / rtogs mdzad dang / spyan legs pa dang / don la gnas pa'i blo mnga' ba dang / snang ba'i 'od zer dang / spos kyi gzi brjid dang / kun tu
21b6(rgyud 'grel): dga' bar mdzad pa dang / don yod par gshegs pa dang / khro ba bcom dang / gzugs mchog dang / legs gshegs dang / rab tu sbyin par grags dang / 'od gtsang dang / lha yi nyi ma dang / shes rab byin pa dang / mnyam par bzhag
22a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bdag nyid dang / gzi mdangs dang / rgyal rigs dang / skal ldan shing rta dang / gser mchog dang / rnam par grol ba'i gtsug lag dang / chos ldan dang / spos gnas dang / dregs spangs dang / ye shes mdzod dang
22a2(rgyud 'grel): tshangs par gshegs dang / tsan dan dang / mya ngan med dang / seng ge'i 'od zer dang / yul 'khor tog dang / pad+ma'i snying po dang / gzi brjid mtha' yas dang / lha'i 'od zer dang / shes rab tog dang / mkhas pa dang / ye shes 'byor ldan
22a3(rgyud 'grel): dang / tshangs pa'i dbyig dang / phyag na rin chen dang / dbang ldan dang / rdzogs par gsungs dang / mchog tu gsungs dang / mchod 'os dang / skar rgyal dang / nyi ma dang / 'dam las rgal ba dang / ye shes brnyes pa dang / grub pa dang /
22a4(rgyud 'grel): rma bya dang / chos byin dang / phan par bzhed pa dang / ye shes ldan pa dang / grags pa dang / 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / rnam par bcom pa dang / bai DUn+d+ha'i snying po dang / me tog dang / lha'i rgyal po dang / zla ba dang / dran pa'i 'od dang / dge ba'i
22a5(rgyud 'grel): 'od dang / yon tan mchog ma kun gyi 'od dang / rin po che'i dpal dang / skyes bu zla ba dang / sgra gcan dang / bdud rtsi'i 'od dang / 'jig rten gyi mchog dang / skar ma'i 'od dang / zhi ba'i stobs dang / ye shes rgya mtsho dang / ri bo
22a6(rgyud 'grel): dbang po dang / rab tu zhi ba dang / yon tan mtha' yas pa'i stobs dang / lha'i dbang po dang / dbyangs snyan dang / ngos bzang dang / don la gnas pa dang / yon tan gzi brjid dpal dang / mkhyen ldan zla med dang / nga ro dpag med dang
22b1(rgyud 'grel): 'od bzang dang / shin tu thugs gzhungs dang / don dgongs gti mug bral ba dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag khyad 'phags dang / mchog tu mdzes par gshegs pa dang / zhi ba'i don dang / skyon med dang / blo sbyangs dge ba dang / pad+ma'i mdzod
22b2(rgyud 'grel): dang / 'od zer bzang po dang / spobs pa'i mdog dang / stegs bzang po dang / tshogs kyi dbang po dang / bsnyengs pa dang bral ba dang / ye shes bzhed pa dang / spobs pa'i spyan dang / blo'i mchog dang / zla ba dang / rin chen zla 'od dang / bsnyengs
22b3(rgyud 'grel): pa med pa dang / gzigs pa med pa dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / dbyangs bzang po dang / shes rab chen po'i stegs dang / blo gros zla med dang / rdo rje mkhregs dang / byang chub blo gros dang / ljon shing dbang po dang / gdangs snyan pa dang /
22b4(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams kyi stobs dang / mthu'i dpal rnamaso// shar la sogs pa'i sgo bzhi ru// rnal 'byor ma rnams rim bzhin du// dkar po chom rkun ro langs ma// zla bod ma yang rnam par dgod// grwa la gnas pa'i lha mo bzhi//
22b5(rgyud 'grel): spos mo ri khrod ma de bzhin// gtum mo dang ni g.yung mo ste// rim pas sngon bzhin brtag ces bya// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo gsum pa la// dga' ba bzhi ni dag pa yis// kun nas ri mo bzhin ca no// phyi rol dur khrod 'khor lo ni/
22b6(rgyud 'grel): chu yi dkyil 'khor dbus su ste// byis pa gsod dang lhag ma za// g.yul grags po dang mche ba kun// shar la sogs pa g.yon skor du// de ltar brtse ba chen pos bsam// du ba mun nag nang gi mi// hA hA'i sgra dang sgra chen no//
23a1(rgyud 'grel): shing ni tsan+danag pur dang // dzA ti pha la dang e la// nA ga ge sar tsam pa dang / kun tu ru dang lha yi shing // phyogs skyong rnams ni mtshon bya ba// nyi ma bsil ba sa yi bu// ri bong can skyes bla ma nyid// ngan spong nyi ma'i bud
23a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin// lha min mgo bor shes bya ste// drag po'i gdong rnamasu bya'o// 'bar ba ral gri chu gri dang // mdung rings spu gri brag de bzhin// glog dang sna tshogs mtshon 'bebs par// dur khrod kyis ni dbus su bya// ral gri mig sman ri lu dang //
23a3(rgyud 'grel): rkang pa byug dang bcud len dang // mchil lham dngul chu sa 'og gi/ dngos grub bsgrub pa mkhas pas bya zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi 'khor lo ste/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo gsum gyi bdag nyid do// / de nas de yi
23a4(rgyud 'grel): phyi rol 'chad// thugs kyi 'khor lo 'di gsal ba'o// mdog rnams sum cu rtsa drug rtsibs// thams cad rang bzhin skyes pa mchog/ klu mo gnod sbyin mo 'byung mo// yi dgas dmyal mo mnar med mo// ltung ba mo dang bar med ma/
23a5(rgyud 'grel): bum mo gshin rje ma de bzhin// thig nag ma dang me mdag ma// tsha ba mo dang rab tsha mo// ngu 'bod ma dang ngu 'bod che// mar nag dug 'tshod ri gnyis 'tshir// sdang ma rmongs ma phrag dog ma// chags myos ser sna skud pa ma// grang ma ral gri'i
23a6(rgyud 'grel): nags ma nyid// du ma dang ni mu ge ma// nad dgon ma dang mtshon gyi dang // chu yi dgon pa ma dang ni// ral gri sen mo rab med ma// spu gri'i so ma 'khor lo ma// grul bum mo ste lha mo tshe// mdog ni 'khor lo ji 'dra ba'o// phyag na mtshon cha sngon bzhin du
23b1(rgyud 'grel): shes bya rang gi gzugs cano// de la nye ba'i dur khrod dang // de nas sa ni chos kyi sprin// sems kyi rang bzhin dag pa nyid// kun 'gro 'khor lo can du 'dod// rang bzhin spang bas bdag med pa// 'khor lo can sngar bzhugs pa'o// 'khor lo
23b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni rim dzI bzhin// thams cad de ltar shes par bya// gnas bzhi rnams la bcu gnyis// de ltar bcu drug ces bya ba// stong pa nyid du mkhas pa yi// ye shes rnam shes ngo bo'i phyir// dur khrod bcom ldan 'das rang nyid// sprul
23b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'khor lo 'di la ni// gsum gyi bdag nyid ming giso// phyi nas gzhan ni thams cad ni// 'khor lo gnyisu shes par bya// thugs kyi 'khor lo dang po'o// // de nas phyi rol du gzhan pa// gsung gi 'khrol de bshad bya//
23b4(rgyud 'grel): dmar po gcod kyi kha dog ste// sum cu drug rtsibs bdag nyid gtso// mchod pa za ma gnyis ma dang // le lo ma chos sems skom mo// khyim sems bud med sems ma dang // don sems ma dang sbyor bral ma// bu sems rnams dang
23b5(rgyud 'grel): mya ngan ma// byasam gtan ma dang sngags zlos ma// ngo tsha rgyal gdungs pa mo// sems can don byed brtson ma dang // rgyal po sems ma gzhan gnod na/ ye shes thob ma dka' thub ma// rgyus ma 'chi ba'i bsam pa can// bde ba sdug ma mi
23b6(rgyud 'grel): dge ma// yod dang med dang gnyis dang ni// bla ma sems la 'gro ba mo// bzod ma mi bzod ma ngal ma// ngal sos ma dang bkres pa mchog/ las ni thams cad byed lha mo// rang bzhin 'khor lo 'di che ba'o// kha dog rang bzhin 'khor lor grang
24a1(rgyud 'grel): lhag ma 'dir ni sngon bzhi no// shes rab thabs bdag nyid lha mo// rang bzhin gyis ni dkyil 'khor 'di// gdan bzhi pa'i rgyud stong phrag ni// bcu gnyis pa las bshad pa ste// ye shes mkha' 'gro ma sogs kyi// mchod sogs
24a2(rgyud 'grel): lha mor 'dod pa yin// grong mtha'i gnas ni 'di lta bu// kun gyi 'od kyi sa yin no// de ltar ye shes sogs sku'i mtha'// rlung me chu dang na mkha' yi// bskor ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya bar// rdo rje mchog mang shes par bya zhes bya ba ni gsung gi
24a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo'i gnyis pa sprul pa'i 'khor lo'o// // de nas sku yi 'khor lo bshad// sku gsung thugs kyi kha dog can// sum cu rtsa drug dbyibs 'dra ba// rnal 'byor ma 'khor sgyur ma'o// rgyal chen bzhi yi rigs ma dang // sum cu rtsa
24a4(rgyud 'grel): gsum 'khor sgyur ma// 'thab bral dga' ldan 'khor sgyur ma// 'phrul dga' ma dang de bzhin du// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ma dang ni// tshangs ris ma yi 'khor lo ma// tshangs pa mdun 'don ma de bzhin// tshangs pa chen po 'khor
24a5(rgyud 'grel): sgyur ma// 'od chung tshad med 'od ma dang // 'od gsal me dang dge chung ma// tshad med dge ba'i 'khor sgyur ma// dge rgyas ma dang sprin med ma// bsod nams skyes pa'i 'khor lo dang // 'bras bu chen po'i 'khor sgyur ma// mi che mi
24a6(rgyud 'grel): gdung 'khor sgyur ma// shin tu mtho ma bzang snang ma// 'og min ma yi 'khor sgyur ma// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched ma// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched ma// ci'ang med skye mched ma de nas// 'du shes med 'du shes med min ma// /
24b1(rgyud 'grel): dmyal mo yi dwags ma de bzhin// dud 'gram mo lha man mo// gzhal mad mkha' spyad ma nga bzhin// zla ma nya ma gA shan rje lo// dbang mo 'khor sbyar mar shes bya// rang gi 'khor lo'i mdog bzhin bya// phyag dang mtshon ma sngar bzhin//
24b2(rgyud 'grel): shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin te// nye ba'i grong mthar yang dag gnas// sa ni mos pas spyod pa'o// de nas de yi phyi khyams la// 'phags pa dgyes pa dang / mthu stobs dang / skar ma la dgyes pa dang / sprin gyi rnga sgra dang / spyan sdug
24b3(rgyud 'grel): zhal dang / ye shes bzang ldan dang / 'byor ldan dang / yon tan phung po dang / gsal ba dang / chos kyi rgyal mtshan dang / ye shes nga ro dang / nam mkha' dang / mchod sbyin nga ro dang / shes rab rnam dgod nga ro dang / yon tan 'od zer gzi
24b4(rgyud 'grel): brjid dang / drang srong dbang po dang / blo ldan dang / spobs pa'i tshogs dang / mchod sbyin bzang po dang / zla ba'i zhal dang / shin tu gzigs dang / rdul bral dang / yon tan tshogs dang / tog ldan dang / bsod nams rgyal mtshan dang / yul
24b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor spobs pa dang / rin chen rab skyon dang / zla dgyes dang / seng ge'i stobs dang / dbang sgyur rgyal po dang / bdud rtsi gsal ba dang / bsam gtan snyoms dang / 'khrul pa med pa dang / dri ma rab tu zhi ba dang / phyogs ma slad dang /
24b6(rgyud 'grel): mdzes pa dang / zhal bzang dang / shugs gnas ye shes ldan dang / gsung gi dbang po dang / gzi brjid chen po dang / blo gros zab mo dang / bdud rtsi dang / chos kyi stobs dang / mchod par ldan pa dang / me tog 'od dang / khams gsum
25a1(rgyud 'grel): dag gi mchod pa'i gnas dang / sgra gcan nyi ma'i snying po dang / lha'i mchod pa dang / thar pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / dge ba'i gtsug dang / bdud rtsi'i 'od dang / rdo rje dang / brtan pa dang / rin chen phung po dang / mdzes par ga
25a2(rgyud 'grel): dang / nyi ma lta bur gshegs pa dang / dag pa'i 'od dang / yon tan gtsug dang / dpal rdzogs pa dang / seng ge'i stobs dang / gyen du 'phags pa dang / me tog byin dang / 'od 'gyed pa dang / pad ma dang / ye shes dgyes pa dang / bkod pa mdzes
25a3(rgyud 'grel): dang / gti mug med par gnas pa dang / rma med pa dang / tog gi rgyal mtshan dang / bde bar dgongs dang / gti mug med pa'i rgyal po dang / cho ga mkhyen pa dang / dag pa'i rgya mtsho dang / rin chen mnga' ba dang / mi mnga' ba dang / skye bo dga'
25a4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad dang / rma bya'i nga ro dang / ma zhum pa dang / srid pa'i sred pa'i dri ma spangs pa dang / spyod pa'i sngags dang / lha mo dag gi snyan par bsgrags pa dang / rin po che'i stabs dang / phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa dang / dpal dang / dgra las rgyal ba dang /
25a5(rgyud 'grel): 'byor ldan grags pa dang / yul 'khor bzang po dang / me tog 'od dang / seng ge'i nga ro dang / zla ba lngar shar dang / 'joms pa'i mchog dang / mi g.yo ba dang / phan pa dang ldan par gshegs pa dang / bsod nams sgron ma'i rgyal po dang /
25a6(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs kyis bskul ba dang / gau ta mi dang / mdangs stobs dang / blo gnas pa'i rang bzhin dang / zla ba bzang po dang / byang chub yan lag me tog spos dang / bkra shis dang / legs ston dang / ye shes gzi brjid stobs dang / mthu rtsal
25b1(rgyud 'grel): sa gan sa pa ma nga
25b2(rgyud 'grel): dang / ng+yas gsum mkhyen pa 'a nga/ dran pa'i dbang po dang / thogs pa med pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / byung sa mchog rngu bzod pa dang / stong pa gsal ba dang / na gyis dang / chos kyi dbang phyug dang / lha khams pa dang / @ma
25b3(rgyud 'grel): chen po dang / bshes gnyen bzang po dang / rab tu zhi ba'i stabs dang / bdud rtsi'i bdag po dang / ldan po'i 'od dang / 'phags pas bstod dang / snang ldan dang / gzi brjid 'bar ba dang / snang ba gzigs dang / legs sbyang rnam par smin dang /
25b4(rgyud 'grel): ljags dgyes dang / mya ngan bral dang / rin chen 'od dang / spyod par ldan dang / bsod nams stobs dang / yon tan rgya mtsho dang / rmang du byung ba dang / ngaN+Dal spong ba dang / bdud brlagi mdzad dang / bag chags las rgal ba'i stobs dang
25b5(rgyud 'grel): mi byed pa'i blo mnga' bo dang / rgya mtsho dang / dag par mdzad po dang / tshigs can sgrol ba'i rgyal po dang / dga' ba'i 'od dang / byang chub rgyal mtshan dang / ye shes rin chen dang / shin tu bsil ba dang / tshangs pa rgyal ba dang / ye shes
25b6(rgyud 'grel): dgyes dang / rdzu 'phrul tog dang / skye dbang mtshungs dang / sa'i dbang phyug dang / ma dgyes dang / sgra gcan zla ba dang / me tog 'od dang / sman pa'i bdag po dang / mdangs mnga' ba dang / bsod nams dgyes dang / dga' ba'i stobs
26a1(rgyud 'grel): dang / dbyangs snyan pa dang / chos kyi dbang phyug dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / spyod brnangs dang / 'khrul pa med pa'i blo dang / dbyangs chen po dang / snyan par grags pa dang / tog ldan dang / gzi brjid rnam par grags pa dang /
26a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba'i dbang phyug dang / ljon pa dang / gti mug rab tu zad pa dang / dpag tu med pa dang / zla ba bzang po dang / spobs pa mtha' yas tog dang / brtul zhugs brtan pa dang / mchod pa'i gnas dang / mya ngan rgal ba dang / dge ba dgyes
26a3(rgyud 'grel): dang / 'gro ba'i blo gros dang / dgyes par gshegs dang / zhabs mdzes pa dang / ut+pal dang / dul gan sa me tog dang / spobs pa mtha' yas 'od zer dang / drang srong gsal ba dang / yon tan brtson 'grus dang / snying po dang / lha'i
26a4(rgyud 'grel): bdag po dang / rin chen mthon po dang / gsal ba dang / sbrul ldan shing rta can dang / bsod nams blo gros dang / sbyin sreg 'od 'phro dang / yon tan mtha' yas gzi brjid phung po dang / seng ge'i stabs dang / mi g.yo ba dang /
26a5(rgyud 'grel): gsal dang / 'od spyod dang / glu dbyangs dang / 'khor lo 'dzin dang / dbyig gi mchog dang / 'jig rten las dga' ba dang / chos zla dang / dga' ba mtha' yas grags pa dang / sprin gyi tog dang / shes rab 'gros dang / spos bzang
26a6(rgyud 'grel): dang / na mkha'i dbyangs dang / lha dang / lha'i rgyal ba dang / nor bu gsal ba dang / nor bzangs dang / sgron ma dang / rin chen nga ro'i dbyangs dang / skye dbang rgyal po dang / sgra gcan sbed dang / dge ba mdzad pa dang / seng ge'i blo gros
26b1(rgyud 'grel): dang / mi g.yo ba dang / rin chen grags pa dang / don mdzad dang / mdzad pa mtha' yas gzigs pa dang / sring ba'i me tog dang / mdzod bu ldan dang / spobs pa mtshungs pa med pa'i rgyal po dang / ye shes rnam par 'byed pa'i nga ro dang / sang
26b2(rgyud 'grel): ge'i mche ba dang / mdzes par gshegs pa dang / bsod nams sgron mA dang / bkra shis ldan dang / yul 'khor mya ngan med pa dang / blo gros sems dpa' dang / blo dang ldan pa dang / chos kyi sgron ma'i spyan dang / shin tu gzigs dang / shugs
26b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'od 'dor ba dang / stobs can dang / shes rab me tog dang / brten pa'i dbyangs dang / bdi ldan dang / don gasmangs dang / dgyes par gsal ba dang / seng ge'i zhal dang / gtsug phung dang / snang mdzad rnams te phyag rgya sna tshogs mdzad pa'o//
26b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo 'di ni gru bzhi ste// sprul pa'i sku ni 'du sheso// ri mo lnga ni me long sogs// thams cad mtshan nyid kyi mtshan ma'o// brgyad gnyis lha mos byas pa yis// mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi pa'o// phyi rol dur khrod brgyad rnams te//
26b5(rgyud 'grel): sgo skyong ma ni rim ji bzhin// shar du chu skyes dkar mo sgom// byung du gAn+d+ha ri mu'o// nub tu rdo rje garar+ya mA ste// lho rur+d+ha rgod ma yi kha// glu yi char ni lha mo bzhi// dbang ldan la sogs rim ji bzhin// lha mo rdo rje 'bar zhal mA// rdo rje
26b6(rgyud 'grel): gnyer ma'i zhal// rdo rje 'thub ma gtum mo ste// kha dog la sogs sngon bzhi no// drag mo chen mo gcig pa'i zhal// 'bar ba'i phreng bas rnam mdzes ma'o// dpa' bo rnams kyi mdog dang gzugs// rnal 'byor ma kun ji lta ba'o//
27a1(rgyud 'grel): kun la mgo ba'i phreng bas brgyan// dpa' bo rnams la dar phreng can// ral pa'i cod pan dpa' de rnams// yan lag kun la thal bas bskus// rnal 'byor ma rnams thams cad kyi// nu ma mkhrang zhing mtho ba
27a2(rgyud 'grel): ste// lag gdub spyi gtsug brgyan pa dang // mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs// phag mo'i rigs las byung ba'o// phyi rol dur khrod bshad bya ba// dang por tshig par shes bya ste// gnyis pa yang ni ma tshig par// gsum par dum buH/
27a3(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa nyid// bzhi pa yang ni ma btubs pa// lnga pa 'jig su rung ba bshad// drug pa yang ni 'jigs byed pa// bdun pa gsal shing phug pa ste// steng nas btags pa'o// dur khrod brgyad por rtag tu ni// dmyal bsrungs chen po brgyad rnams
27a4(rgyud 'grel): shA ma li shing mya ngan med// yongasu u 'bar de bzhino// Dom pa ri dang ma b+ha ri// rgya shugs pa dang nai ba ru rA'o// sna tshogs ro langs tshogs dang ni// rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo'i tshogs// mkha' spyod ma dang sa spyod gzhan// gang yin de
27a5(rgyud 'grel): yang rdzu 'phrul che// mgo med pargyug dang gzhan yang ni// mgo bo med par gar byed dang // nyal ba dang ni rkang med dang // mgo bo lus sogs btub pa ste// ting 'dzin chen po rgyu yis ni// de ltar gar bcas par byed pa'o// de ltar de'i dbus su
27a6(rgyud 'grel): ni// rgyu skar sna tshogs bya ba yin// kha dog sna tshogs shes bya ste// bzhon pa gang gi yin pa'o// de ltar dur khrod kun la bya// rdzogs pa'i byang chub rgyu'i bdag nyid// yongs rdzogs dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// 'di ni sku'i 'khor lo sku gsum gyi
27b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid dang sprul pa dang lhan cig pa ste gsum pa'o// gca ba'i thugs kar nyi ma la gnas pa'i hUM gis sa bon ljang sngon bsam par bya'o// mag por zla ba dang 'khor la gnas pa'i oM dkar po'o// mgrin par zla ba dang pad ma la gnas pa'i
27b2(rgyud 'grel): AHdmar po'o// snying gar zla ba dang rdo rje la gnas pa'i hUM sngon po'o// dkyil 'khor ba thams cad la yang snying kar nyi ma la gnas pa'i hUM rang rang gi kha dog can yod par bsam par mos par bya'o// de nas gtso bo'i thugs ka'i hUM gnyis kyi bar du raM
27b3(rgyud 'grel): dmar po las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro// de'i steng du oM ha baM hA baM/ hi bi hI bI/ hu bu hA b+h+ya/ he be haM be/ ho bo haM bau/ haM baM haHbaHhUM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT phaT swA hA swA hA/ zhes bya ba kha dog dkar dmar g.yon bskor du sbrul 'khyil pa ltar gnas pa rdo rje
27b4(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' dang phag mo'i ngo bo// mgo bor de bzhin duny+tsA ma lA/ oM na hA nA dz+nyA na~M ha~M nA~M tsun m+b+hi rten nan ta na ha naHhaHd+hun+d+ra hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT phaT swA hA swAhA/ ser zhing sngo byas rnam par snang mdzad do// gshin rje mI'i rang bzhin// spyi gtsug tA
27b5(rgyud 'grel): ma la/ oM sU hUM swA hUM sI hrIM sI hU~M swA hUM swA hUM s+ye hreM saM hUM s+pho hriM s+pho hriM sa~M hraM saMHhAHhUM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT phaT swA hA swA hA zhes bya ba dmar zhing dkar ba pad ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang rmongs byed ma'i ngo bo'o// dpung pa gnyis kyi nang du nyi ma oM ba hr-i bA hU~M ba hriM bI
27b6(rgyud 'grel): dzA lu dz+ra bAp+na nr-i badz+ra ba d+hi kro dza~M badz+ra ba~MHhraHhrI pU d+yA drA phaT phaT phaT phaT swA hA swA hU~M nas bya ba gnag cing se ra bi hi ru ka dang bskong byed ma'o// spyan gnyis pa la nyi ma'i steng du/ oM tsu hUM haM ha hA dz+dza/ hi hi hriM hrI/ hUM hUM ni \u0f7fn+ta ha ha hi ga~M ha~M ha~M haM ha ha haHhe/ hUM
28a1(rgyud 'grel): hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT phaT swA hA swA hA zhes bya ba rnams dmar zhing ldang ba rdo rje nyi ma dang skrag byed ma'o// mdzad spu'i thad ka'i nang du nyi ma la a pha pha pA pA pheM bi phI phu phu phU pA pheM pheM paM pheM pho pho pheM pheM pheM pheM phaHphaHhUM hUM dz+nyA hUM phaT
28a2(rgyud 'grel): phaT phaT phaT swA hA swA hA zhes bya ba ldang zhing dud kha rta mchog dang gtum mo ste 'di las yi ge'i tshogs 'phros pas rkang mthil nas spyi bo'i bar do'i rdul phra rab bo// lus kyi phyi rol tu oM ha dkar po snying ga dang / na ma hi ser po mgo bo la
28a3(rgyud 'grel): dang / swA hA hu dmar po spyi gtsug tu dang / bau Sha Da he nag po dpung pa gnyis la dang / hUM hUM ho da mar ser mig gnyis la dang / yan lag thams cad la phaT haM ljang gu'o// rdo rje phag mo'i lte bar oM paM dmar po dang / haM yoM sngon mo snying
28a4(rgyud 'grel): gar ro// hriM moM dkar mo kha la'o// hreM hriM ser mo mgo bo la'o// hUM hUM ljang gu spyi gtsug tu'o// phaT phaT dud kha smin mtshamasu bkod de/ de las 'phros pa'i lus thams cad dgang ba'o// de nas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang gnyisu
