106b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams// ston pa'i mdun du dbul bar bya// thams cad nye bar bya ba'i phyir// rdo rje blo ma la dbul bya// de nas me bsad zhi ba la// 'o ma yis ni rgyal bsgrub la// dri gsar rnams kyis dbang dang khro// 'o ma khrag tu dkar
106b6(rgyud 'grel): min pa'i zhes so// sbyin sreg gi thal ba dang sol ba ni las thams cad pa'i bum par blugs la chu klung la bskur bar bya'o// lha tshim par byed pa'i rab tu byed pa'o// / da ni nang gi sbyin sreg bshad par bya
107a1(rgyud 'grel): ste// nang la mchog tu gzhol ba'i sgrub pa pos 'jam zhing yangs pa'i stan la 'dug ste/ sems can thams cad la brtse ba sngon du song bas skad cig gis zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa'i phag mo dang
107a2(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa bde mchog du dmigs la/ rkang pa'i mthil du yaM las byung ba'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang / de'i steng du raM las me'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas zlum po lte bar skyes pa'i thab// snying gi ru ni gru bzhi pa// nor bu'i
107a3(rgyud 'grel): bu gar zur drug pa// mgrin pa ru ni bdun pa ste// zur brgyad pa ni mgo la'o// zur dgu pa ni smin dbus su// gtsug tor du ni zur lnga pa'o// de ltar thams cad kyang rtsa thab kyi dbyibs can du bsgoms te/ thams cad kyi
107a4(rgyud 'grel): dbus su hUM baM sngo ba dang / dmar ba'i mdog can kha sbyor bsams te gtsug tor nas rdo rje nor bu'i bar du rtsa dbu mas sbrel ba g.yas g.yon gyi rtsa dang bcas pa legs par gsal bar byas te/ de nas steng 'og go/
107a5(rgyud 'grel): rlung dgag pa'i sbyor bas rkang mthil gyi rlung gis me sbar te/ lus kyi rtsa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems bzhu nas rtsa g.yas pa dang g.yon par drangs la de gnyis nas dbus ma'i rtse mo'i haM lA bstims te/ de nas
107a6(rgyud 'grel): dbu ma nas babs pas 'bar bzhin pa'i thab rnams byang chub kyi sems kyi dgang thugs phul bas thams cad gong bar gyur te lus kyi rtsa thams cad du yang 'phros par bsam zhing / yang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba goms pa
107b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyun mi 'chad par byas nas dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te/ 'di ni thams cad las khyad par du gyur pa man ngag dang bcas pa bla mas gsungs pa la bdag gi dpe mkhyud ma byas pa ste/ 'di ni nang gi sbyin sreg
107b2(rgyud 'grel): gi rab tu byed pa'o// / de ltar brjod pa'i sbyin sreg thabs// bsod nams tshogs kyi rgyu don dang // ye shes tshogs rdzogs bya ba'i phyir// bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyud du gsungs// de la mi gsal gang cung zad//
107b3(rgyud 'grel): bla ma'i gsung gi rjes 'brangs nas// gzhan la phan gyur srid snyam nas// bdag gis gsal bar byas pa yin// thos bral rtog pa dman pa yi// skye blu na rmongs pa nga rgyal can// 'brel med lung dang mi ldan pa// ngan
107b4(rgyud 'grel): rtog sna tshogs sbyor mthong nas// rab 'byams thos pa ma yin kyang // rang gi gzhung lugs du ma la// skye bar rgyun tu goms byas dang // legs sbyar skod la'ang rtog skyes dang // bla ma'i lung yang legs mnos pas//
107b5(rgyud 'grel): rtsom mo 'os pa bdag min sbrum// bdag gis legs sbyar bsod nams 'dis// 'gro kun nyon mongs thung shing rnams// gnyis med ye shes rab 'bar bas// bag chags bcas pa bsreg gyur cig/ dpal mkha' 'gro
107b6(rgyud 'grel): rgya mtsho'i rgyud kyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga rin po che me shel mkhas pa dza ya se na'i gsung // dpal ye shes rdo rjes bsgyur ba rdzogaso// / dpal ldan mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho yi// rgyud rgyal yid bzhin nor bu
108a1(rgyud 'grel): gter// yid bzhin nor bu'i ris rnam gnyis// bla ma'i gsung gau grur zhugs nas// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i phyogs nyid dang // rdzogs pa'i rim pa sna tshogaso// de la rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i phyogs// grub
108a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i skyes bu mtsho skyes kyis// rgya cher rgyud 'grel nyid du bkral// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i mi gsal ba// mngon rtog dkyil 'khor cho ga dang // sbyin sreg rab gnas tshogs 'khor dang // gtor ma maN+Dal cho ga rnams// blo yi snyam
108a3(rgyud 'grel): pa ma nyams pas// yid bzhin nor bu rnam pa bdun// legs par blangs nas 'dir gtor ma'o// de ltar byas pa'i dge ba 'dis// 'di lta'i nor bral 'gro ba rnams// tshul bzhin bla ma gus bston pas// rin chen 'di rnams
108a4(rgyud 'grel): spyod gyur cig// rgya gar skad du/ sA d+hiSh+ThA na kra mo pa de sha ka sa d+ha na/ bod skad du/ rang byin gyis brlab pa'i man ngag gi sgrub thabs/ bdag gi lha la phyag 'tshalo// dngos min dngos med ma yin mkha' ltar ro/
108a5(rgyud 'grel): mnyam rtogs par dka' ba'i rang bzhin can// gcig man du ma ma yin bdag dang gzhan la phun tshegs phan pa 'byung ba'i gnas// gnyis med bde chen bcom ldan he ru ka dpal 'jigs byed rgyal po 'bar ba'i sku// thub pa'i
108a6(rgyud 'grel): dbang po thugs rje rgyas shing bar chad med par gzhan don rdzogs mdzad rgyal// dang por re shig sgrub pa pos lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pas/ oM swa b+h+rUM wa~M bud+d+haHsar+b+ba d+harmA swa b+ho ba shud+d+ho haM/ zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod
108b1(rgyud 'grel): pa sngon du 'gro bas/ gzung bas der 'dzin med pa'i sems kyang med de/ zhes chos thams cad thog ma med pa nas/ rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i stong pa nyid du yung tsam gyis mngon par bya'o// de'i rjes la chos
108b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa nyid kyi ngang las/ skad cig bcom ldan 'das thugs ka'i chu skyes dang nyi ma la bzhugs pa'i hUM gis de nyid kha dog sngon po/ rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin 'od zer dpag tu med pa 'phro ba can dang
108b3(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa rten dang brten pa'i tshul du rnam pa thams cad rdzogs par blta bar bya ste/ rin po che sna bzhi las grub pa'o ri'i rgyal po ri rab zur bzhi pa'i steng du/ sna tshogs pad ma'i lte ba dang ze 'brur ldan pa'i dbus su
108b4(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i bcom ldan 'das rje btsun dpal he ru kau sku mdog zar mo'i me tog sar pa lta bu zhal cig pa/ spyan gsum pa/ shes rab la mkhyud pa'i phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dang dril bu bsnam
108b5(rgyud 'grel): pagayas brkyang pa/ 'jigs byed chen po deng dus mtshan mnan pa/ mche ba gtsigs shing zhal rnam par 'gyur ba/ ral pa'i cod pan dang spyi gtsug nor pus brgyan pa/ sna tshogs rdo rje dang zla ba phyed pa dbul
108b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa/ mi bskyod pa'i dbu rgyan can/ suM khugasu 'khyog cing / dgyes pa'i cha byad can gyi dar dbyangs dang cod pon gyis mdzes par byas pa/ thod pa'i phreng ba can skrag pa la sogs pa gar gyi nyams dgrang
109a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa/ stag gi pags pa'i na bza' 'dzin pa'i mchog/ mi mgo rlon pa'i do shal gyis sku la brgyan pa/ dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi phreng ba can/ phyag rgya drug dang ldan pa'o// de'i mdun du bcom lda
109a2(rgyud 'grel): 'das ma rdo rje rnal 'byor ma/ sku mdog dmar mo gzhon zhing mdzes mA lang tsho dang ldan pa/ zhal gcig ma/ spyan gsum ma/ phyag g.yas pa rdo rje dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub kyis gdug pa can thams cad la bsdigs
109a3(rgyud 'grel): pa/ phyag g.yon pa yau pa la mkhyud pas bdud la sogs pa'i khrag gi bkang ba'i thod pa 'dzin pa/ dpral ba'i mtshamasu thod pa lngas brgyan pa/ dbu skra nag po'i tshogs grol ba/ na mkha'i na bza' bsnams pa phyag rgya la
109a4(rgyud 'grel): ldan mo/ mi mgo skam po'i phreng ba can/ g.yas kyis byin pa la 'khyud pa/ g.yon brkyang ma/ bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid can/ de lta bu dang snyoms par zhugs pa'i dga' bas brgyan pa'i bcom ldan 'das bskal pa'i me
109a5(rgyud 'grel): lter 'bar ba'i gzi brjid chen mo dang ldan pa'i bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o// de dag ni bcom ldan 'das shes rab dang bcas pa'i sku rnam par dag pa'o// de la skyo bar gyur na/ oM hrIHha ha huM hUM phaT/ zhes bya ba'i sngag
109a6(rgyud 'grel): brjod par bya'o// de ni dbang po tha ma'i dmigs par bya'o// da ni dbang po 'bring gi ting nge 'dzin 'od gsal du 'jug pa dang ldan pa brjod par bya ste/ de yang rang gi thugs ka na gnas pa'i hUM/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
109b1(rgyud 'grel): cad kyi bdag nyid can de'i snang bas/ brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i rang bzhin can gyis khams mtha' dag 'od kyi rang bzhin du byas pa la rjes su gzhig pa'i rim pas me long la dbugs bzhin du/ rim pa ji lta ba bzhin nA da'i bar
109b2(rgyud 'grel): bsrungs shing thim nas/ de yang rim gyis phra bar gyur te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin/ chos sku 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo// dbyer med par bzhugs pa la blta bar bya'o// slar yang gdul bya'i bsod nams dang / rang gi smon lam
109b3(rgyud 'grel): gyi shugs kyis/ zung 'jug longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i ngo bor bzhengs te/ de las sprul pa dpag tu med pa 'phros nas/ sems can gyi khams mtha' dag gi don byed par bya'o// ril por 'dzin pa ni rnam grangs gzhan no//
109b4(rgyud 'grel): gzhan yang dbang po rab mchog tu gyur pas/ zung 'jug longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// stong pa'i ngo bo bde ba che// ji ltar snang bzhin bden spangs pa// me long nang gi gzugs brnyan bzhin// gzung dang 'dzin pa med 'gyur
109b5(rgyud 'grel): zhing // dmigs pa thams cad rnam spangs te// stong dang mi stong las 'das pa// de ni bdud dang nyon mongs tshogs// 'dzin mdzad bde bar gshegs pa'i 'khor// 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs shing drag/ he ru kar grags chen
109b6(rgyud 'grel): por bzhengs// bla ma'i drin thob bsgom phyir dga'// shugs kyis ye shes rab snang bas// phyogs bcur gsal bar byed par shog/ rang la byin gyis brlabs pa'i rim pa'i man ngag gi sgrub thabs/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang
110a1(rgyud 'grel): phyug chen po ku mA ra shris/ dpal na lan da'i gtsug lag khang du/ sar+b+ba ta'i skad du mdzad pa rdzogs/ rgya gar skad du/ shrI sam+ba ro pa de sha mu kha kar+N+Na pa ra tsin+d+ra ma Ni nA ma/ bod skad du/
110a2(rgyud 'grel): dpal sdom pa'i man ngag zhal nas snyan du brgyud pa yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshalo// sku gsum bdag nyid dgos 'byung bla ma dam pa'i zhabs pad ze 'bru dri mo nga 'od zer la phyag 'tshal// gas
110a3(rgyud 'grel): sngags mthar thug snying po'i bcud phyung yid bzhin nor bu mkha' 'gro'i gsung bzhin rtogs pas 'dir gsil bkod// bde gshegs thugs la snang ba med pany+tsa pa nas rtogs pa ke ri li ru gsang bdag mnyes// spyod pas zil
110a4(rgyud 'grel): mnan lus kyi bkod pas rnal 'byor rjes bzung mdzad pa tha mas 'gro rnams stong par byas// bslab pa gsum dang brgyad par ldan pa nyamasu myong bas 'jug tshul shes pas bla ma dam par shes// pen nga ba dang rigs chad bran
110a5(rgyud 'grel): ltar ru sbal spu ste mo bsham bu ltar slob ma skyon lnga bral// mchog gi don 'dod gang gis de bsten thog mar bang bzhis rgyud smin thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba nyid// 'di don rim par brgyud pa rna bar 'phro byed de tshe sangs rgyas
110a6(rgyud 'grel): bstan gnas gus pas nyan par bgyis// sa yi cho ga lhag par gnas pa rig byed slob dpon rigs sbyor sems kyis bum pa'i dbang bskur bya// bslab pa rgyud mdzes thos bsam nor ldan bla mar 'os pa phul la bla mas
110b1(rgyud 'grel): gsal stong la sogs bkur// nyer lnga lhag spangs rigs ldan spras zag bcas sku la sogs gsum pa byin nas brtul zhugs brtan par bya// dga' ba gsum son lhan cig skyes pa rnyog pa dang bral du byas sogs 'bras
110b2(rgyud 'grel): bur shes par gyis// dbang bzhi dang 'brel brda yis mtshon pa shes rab bdag nyid sin+d+hu ra la mnyes sogs ston mos brgyan// slob dpon bzhi la dbang bzhi dus bzhi byed pa bcu gnyis chos nyid dbang la mtshan du med par
110b3(rgyud 'grel): byos// dbang gis smin nas rim pa gnyis shes rnal 'byor dbang phyug zung du 'jug pa'i rgyal ba'i sku bsgrub phyir// dbang po'i rim pas dbye dang bsdu ba'i rim pa shes nas 'du 'dzi med pas rgyun du 'bad pas spyad// tshangs
110b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gnas bzhi gsol dang khams sogs bslab pa 'khor lo tshogs brten rgyu 'bras nyid dang phra mor badz+rod// go cha ye shes rgya gdab sku gsung mchod dang bzlas pa rdzogs rim phrin las phyogs dang thub pa nyid// bsdus pa'i
110b5(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba tshad med bzhi ldan rdzus te skyes pa skad cig rnal 'byor bzlas pas bcas pa nyid// brtan g.yo'i dngos po lhan cig skyes pa snang sems dbyer med rnon po'i spyod yul zung 'jug rdo rje'i sku// kun la khyab pa ngo bo
110b6(rgyud 'grel): nyid ston gsal rig mtshan nyid thub pa'i dbang po bde gshegs kun gyi gtso// gsum gsal bdag gis mngon sum nyid du legs par rtogs nas bsgom dang bzlos pa gsal por rab tu phye// chos dbyings skye med
111a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba'i yum gcig rgyan dang phyogs dang rgyal ba nyid de na mkha'i ri mar blta// brtan dang g.yo brtan dang brtan pa lnga yi rang bzhin rang lnga bcug nus sna yi rtse mar rdo rje bzlas// gtar ma thun
111a2(rgyud 'grel): nas dbang po 'bring pos 'od gsal bsgoms te dbang sogs lam dang dam tshig 'bras bur bsre// bdag 'jug dbang dang bla ma mchod byed nyams chags bskad phyir rdo rje sems dpa' brtan pa'i cho ga bzlas// rgyal ba
111a3(rgyud 'grel): blon po dmangs kyi byed pas mtshams kyi kun spyod za nyal 'gro dang khrus sogs rnal 'byor bya// rnam rtog dang bral zla ba drug tu nges par bsams na grub pa'i mtshon ma mthong nas rol par gnas// thub pa'i bstan
111a4(rgyud 'grel): pa rgyas mdzad dngos grub mthar 'byin zab dang rgya che gnyis med dam tshig kun gyi gzhi// pog yod bsgom zhing brten dang gsang ba mi bsag mi 'bral bza' bsrung mchog gyur thub pas rab tu gsungs// bslab pa
111a5(rgyud 'grel): gsum dang rgyu 'bras zhen med dbang sogs 'bras bu rgyud gzhan las gsungs rang sems dran pas ba srung // sku gsum la brten ting 'dzin gsum gyis rgya cher rab gsal gzhi lam 'bras bus lta ba mtshon par gyis//
111a6(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor sreg rtsol sangs rgyas lnga bdag g.yon dang g.yas su rim pa ji bzhin rgyu ma nges pa ste// mnyam par bzhag pas 'jug pa'i rlung nyid bum po can du byas nas brtan pa'i go 'phang so sor thob// rlung gi sbyor
111b1(rgyud 'grel): med nyid mi shes pa las dang las min 'grub rig pas ni 'bras bu ster// bsdams pa che dang bzlas pa'i rim pa goms pas dge dang mi dge 'chi bzlog rlung rig pas ni shes// dbye dang phyed las chos mtshungs
111b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyun mtshan bsdam pa'i sbyor ba'i bskyed rims goms pas mthun po'i rkyen dang ldan// gsang spyod la gnas sdug bsngal bzod pa lus gnad gsum ldan dmigs pa bzhi la sbyor ba'i skyon bsalo te// steng 'og par dang
111b3(rgyud 'grel): 'bugs pa'i sbyor ba li khro'i tshul du sgo gsum sbyang bar bya phyir nges par rol// rdo rje bzlas pa yog 'bru gsum la goms shing sangs rgyas lnga la kha dog so sor bslab par bya// 'byung ba lnga yi rlung zin pas ni du ba smig rgyu me
111b4(rgyud 'grel): khyer mar me sprin med na mkha' 'byung // brtan po'i rtagasu zla zer nyi zer glog gi zer drang 'ja' tshon nyi zla bsres pa dngos su mthong // spyod lam dang ni sbyor ba mkhas pas dug sogs gzhom dang 'chi ba rtag par sna tshogs
111b5(rgyud 'grel): bsgyur// rtsa dang rlung dang thig le 'dris pas bde gsal mi rtog rgyun mi 'chad pa'i rgyal por 'gyur kye// rim pa 'di nyid 'phel bar bya phyir snang dmigs dngos po sgyu mar bsams lnga dben pa'i gnasu ni// rdo rje sems
111b6(rgyud 'grel): dpa' mtshan dpes spras pa'i gzugs brnyan la ni rab tu dmigs la dngos po chu zlo ltar// bcu gnyis sgyu ma'i dpe yis mtshon to minya mi rjes la ni chos brgyad yis 'ang mkha' bzhin snyogs par 'gyur// de ltar
112a1(rgyud 'grel): shes pas mi bya ba med sngags zlos bsrung sogs mi dgos dge slong sogs la phyag mi bya// 'di dang mtshan dus bsre zhing sbyang dang goms pas gyen du 'phangs te bde gshegs
112a2(rgyud 'grel): bltas la chos sogs mnyan// rmi lam med dus gnad dang ldan pas 'dod chags la sogs brgyad cu 'gags nas snang ba gsum 'das te// rgyun chad med pa'i 'od gsal chen pos sa bcur gyur pa/
112a3(rgyud 'grel): lam bgrod na ni rnam shes gong du 'pho// sna tshogs don chen mthong nas shes pa spo ste rim pa gnyis ldan 'jug phyir gzhan gyis mi 'gyur ro// chags dang chags bral 'di ma shes par gzhan ni don med
112a4(rgyud 'grel): dus gsum sangs rgyas bgrod pa gcig po'i lam// ro bor brgyug dang zla ba chu 'dzin dus dang 'brel pa bslab bcas sangs rgyas dgongs pa mi shes phyir// sgo gsum gnad kyis sbyang ba bya zhing ngal na sna
112a5(rgyud 'grel): rtser bltas la nges shes skyes nas chen por blta// dang po'i las kyis yid 'ong la brten goms pas sngags las zhing dang lhan cig skyes sogs rtsa bsnyen bya// cig car mgon po bsgoms nas mtha'i
112a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas rdo rje'i bzlas pa rtsa lo mkhas pas pad+ma'i skyon bzhi bsal// bde ba'i lam drang ye shes mtshon pa mar me 'du ba rgyu 'bras shes nos shes bya'i dkyil 'khor blta// thur sel bcung nas glang chen seng
112b1(rgyud 'grel): ge rma bya 'dren dang bya rgod stag mo snang dmigs bde bar 'char// sbyar ba dngas ma rlung dang mnyam zhing rig mas bde ba lus la spros nas rtsa 'dud dgrol bar bya// bde ba nyams skyes tshogs drug kun la
112b2(rgyud 'grel): ro mnyam lugs las 'byung dang bzlog pas dga' bzhi mtshan par bya// dga' ba gsum dang dpe don bsres nas rgyu tshogs gzung 'dzin chos nyid goms nas rtsol med 'bras bu 'char// ye shes gsal
112b3(rgyud 'grel): byed dbang gi 'bras bu rdo rje lus la 'khor lo mdud pa spyi bor grol ba'i gnas// sgo dgu 'gags nas sgo bzhi thim pa nyid kyis rnam grol ye shes lus can sgra brnyan lta bu bral// mig sogs stong dang bdud bzhi grol
112b4(rgyud 'grel): ba chos nyid la mkhas gsum pa gcig gyur ye shes rgyun chad med// gzhi lam 'bras bu gcig gyur bde chen dngos po ro mnyam yi ge bzhi don 'bras bu mngon du 'gyur// mthar ma sgrol na nye bar spyod pa lus
112b5(rgyud 'grel): ldan gzhi dang nges shes rtags te ngo spyod shes par bya// spyi shi'i bar do shes pa snga phyi gnyid dus dran mtshams 'chi ba'i dus dran phra rags thim nas ni// 'od gsal chen po de ma rtogs na bla ma sogs kyi skyel ba
112b6(rgyud 'grel): sus nying mtshams rlung gsum bcings pa'i phyir// yon tan rdzogs pa bar de longs sku yon tan ldan de ma brtan na dug gsum las gyur pa'i// rtog par bcas la dbang dus nyams dang lha sogs sgro ma zung
113a1(rgyud 'grel): du 'jug pa slob dang mi slob pa// bdun phrag re la brgyal bar 'gyur ba de ma khegs na skye ba sna tshogs sbrul skus nying mtshams sbyar// bar do gsum la 'dod chags la sogs dus gsum
113a2(rgyud 'grel): shes pa zag med 'od gsal sgyu mar bsres la bsgom// 'di don rim pas 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das rgyal gnyis med zung 'jug phyag rgya chen por 'gyur// dbang dang dam tshigs 'brel par shes pa gdod nas
113a3(rgyud 'grel): dag pa rkyen gyis skur tshul nyam su blang dang rtogs// bum sogs dam tshig mnyam gzhag rjes spyod mi 'bral bza' bsrung spros bcas spros med yan lag bshags bya nyid// dbang dus lta sogs mtshon par bya la
113a4(rgyud 'grel): bdud rigs ngos po zung zil gyis mnan nas bsgom dang rtag su 'brel// tha ma 'bring dang rab dang mchog gyur 'jug sgo shes pas sgom la sbyar te gang dang gang la sogs// mchog gi dngos grub tshe 'dir 'dod pas dus
113a5(rgyud 'grel): dang 'brel par spyod pa byas nas gol sa bcad par bya// bya spyod la sogs tshogasu bsgyur la 'phrin las byed pa rab gnas sbyin sreg rnam po bzhis 'dod dgur bsgyur// 'khor lo bzhi la sku bzhir yan lag bdun
113a6(rgyud 'grel): ldan rdo rje sems dpa'i sgo gsum ngo spong mtshan dpes spros// rgyud rnams snying phyung man ngag bcud bsdus lam gyi rim pa bde gshegs kun thugs yid bzhin nor bu nyid// mi mthun phyogs las rgyal bar
113b1(rgyud 'grel): bya phyir 'jug pa'i tshul dang zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gsal ba'i thabs nyid do// lus la go gyon dag gis g.yul sprad sems kyis mtshan bsnun sku gsum khrus bcud rlung dang 'khor lo bskor// rtsa ba drug la yan las
113b2(rgyud 'grel): so dgu nad la sman dpyad bar chad bsrung 'khor gnad bral gegs bsal to// sa la sogs pa'i ro bzhi ngos bzung 'khor lo bzhi yis ro bzhi bsnyams la zhi gnas phyogs la ni// thabs dang ldan pas pi wang sgra sogs
113b3(rgyud 'grel): rtsa rlung la ni shes rab sku gsum mthun sbyor rdzas sogs lnga// zin dang ma zin legs par shes nas lus kyi gnad la nyi ma zla sogs brdzis nas rdul sprugs byed// 'thung bzhi'i rlung la lte ba la sogs stong ra bcas
113b4(rgyud 'grel): nas na tsha bogs 'don gags 'khyims la sogs bsal// bcu pa'i rlung shes ting 'dzin rang grol sman pa lta bus brgyad po bsal nas rdul chu ltar spyad bya// dngas ma bsgrubs na skyon rnams sel phyir bdag
113b5(rgyud 'grel): lha'i bud shing bsregs nas 'od gsal chos sku bkral// 'di don rim brgyud bla ma la brten gus pas blang phyir byin rlabs lam khyer snyan nas snyan du brgyud// mchog gi blo can brtse po chen pos theg gzhan spangs
113b6(rgyud 'grel): la smin dang grol ba rim pa gnyis la 'bad // snod bcud la sogs gzhal yas khang dang phung po khams sogs lha ru dag pas rgyal ba thams cad bsdu// rdo rje lus la bde chen gnas pa pho nya la sogs spros dang
114a1(rgyud 'grel): spros med 'khor lo zung du 'jug/ rim pa 'ang la mos pa brtan pas sbrul mthong zhing sgron yon dang bcas chung ngu yon phyir tshogs// skad cig bzhi yos dga' ba gsums na 'byung ba
114a2(rgyud 'grel): drod de lhan cig skyes pa d+hU tI'i lam zhugs nas// 'jig rten las 'das brgya phrag bdun po yon tan gyis spras gnas dang nye gnas nyi bzhi sogs la/ drangs ma yas byon pu li sogs khyab rgyu ba ma sa brtan bde chen
114a3(rgyud 'grel): brtol nas ma chags pad+ma'i sa// rab bkram chen po phrag bdun yon tan ye shes gsal byed chos sku'i bdag nyid rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur// 'khor lo sdom pa'i bskyed rdzogs la sogs gting dpag dka' ba
114a4(rgyud 'grel): gsal por rab phye snyan rgyud mkha' 'gro'i gsang // dri med bsags pa'i dge ba des ni sa gsum gnas pa rdo rje 'dzin pa'i go 'phang thob par shog/ yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba mkha' 'gro ma'i gsang tshig rdzogs
114a5(rgyud 'grel): rtsibs kyi rgyu mdud dang bcas par mar pa chos kyi blo gros kyis pA la ha rir bsgyur ba'o// / rgya gar skad du/ shrI tsakra sam+ba ra maN+Dal s+tho tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal 'khor
114a6(rgyud 'grel): lo sdom pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bstod pa zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshalo// mgon po dpa' po kun bdag nyid// mkha' 'gro ma kun bdag nyid do// 'khor lo dga' ba bzhi ru grags// skad cig
114b1(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen sogs ngo bo nyid// mi phyed na mkha' dang mtshungs pa// zhal bzhi g.yas brkyang ba yis bzhugs// sa dang pha rol phyin dag pas// phyag dang phyag mtshan 'chang ba'i mchog/ de bzhin shes dang shes dag pas//
114b2(rgyud 'grel): tho dang mgo bo zla phyed 'chang // mi bskyod pa dang drag po'i 'od// gar gyi ro dgu'i nyams dang ldan// sred dang zhe sdang rnam dag pas// 'jigs byed u ma'i steng na bzhugs// dpal ldan 'khor lo'i 'dren pa la//
114b3(rgyud 'grel): lus ngag yid kyis phyag 'tshalo// ye shes 'khor lo'i lte ba na// bde ba che la rnam rol pa// yang dag ting 'dzin rnam dag pas// dpal ldan bde mchog la phyag 'tshal// mgon por yang dag 'khyud bzhugs
114b4(rgyud 'grel): pa// zhal gcig mo la tshar dmar ba// gri gug thod ldan pade rang bzhin// rdo rje phag mo la phyag 'tshal// de mdun zhi ba dga' ba dang // lus dran nye bar gzhag ngo bo// sku mdog nag mo gri thod mtshan// ror gnas
114b5(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro mar phyag 'tshal// g.yon du rgyas dang mchog dga' dang // tshor ba dran pa nyer gzhag rim// sku mdog ljang mo gri thod mtshan// ror gnas lnga ma la phyag 'tshal// nub tu dga' bral dga' ba dang //
114b6(rgyud 'grel): dbang dang sems drin nyer gzhag bzhugs// sku mdog dmar mo gri thod mtshan// ror gnas dum skyes mar phyag 'tshal// g.yas su 'gugs dang lhan cig skyes// chos dran nye bar gzhag pas bzhugs// sku mdog
115a1(rgyud 'grel): ser mo gri thod 'chang // ror gnas gzugs can la phyag 'tshal// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa// phyag rgya lnga yi rnam par brgyan// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal dang mtshungs/
115a2(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro ma sogs bdag phyag 'tshal// pul+li mdun dang mgo bo dang // so dang sen mo rnam dag pas// thugs kyi 'khor lor thong dum dang // rab gtum nag mo la phyag 'tshal// dzA lan+d+ha ra brtson 'grus spyi/
115a3(rgyud 'grel): sgra dang spu ni rnam dag pas// keng rus kyis 'khyud sku mdog sngo// gtum mig ma la phyag 'tshalo// u rgyan dang ni dpyod pa dang // rna ba g.yas dang pags pa dI// keng rus chen po dang lhan cig/ 'od ldan ma la
115a4(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tsha lo// an+d+ra dA dang sems lhag pa// sha yaM khams ni rnam dag pas// mchi ba rnam par gtsigs sbyor ba'o// sna chen mya la phyag 'tshalo// go dA ba ri rna g.yon dang // rtsa rgyus dang dbang bdag nyid de/
115a5(rgyud 'grel): lho dgra dang bcas mkha' 'gro ma// dpa' bo'i blo ma la phyag 'tshal// rA me shwa ri rus pa dang // smin dbus brtson 'grus dbang po dag/ 'od dpag med la yang dag 'khyud// lha mo me'u thung la phyag 'tshal// de ba
115a6(rgyud 'grel): ko Ti mchin pa dang // mig dang dran pa rnam dag pa// rdo rje'i 'od kyis yang dag 'khyu da// lang ka'i dbang phyug mar phyag 'tshal// mA la be dang phrag pa snying // ting 'dzin dbang po rnam dag pa// lha mo rdo rje'i skur sbyor ba//
115b1(rgyud 'grel): shing grib ma la bdag phyag 'tshal// kA ma rA dang mchan khung dang // mig dang shes rab dbang bdag nyid// gsung 'khor dmar po myu gu can// sa srungs ma la phyag 'tshalo// oM Te nu gnyis mkhris pa dang // dad pa'i stobs
115b2(rgyud 'grel): ni rnam dag pa// rdo rje ril pa can gyis 'khyud// 'jigs byed chen mo la phyag 'tshal// tri sha ku ne lte ba'i gnas// glo ba brtson 'grus rnam dag pa// dpa' bo chen pos yang dag 'khyud// rlung shugs ma la bdag phyag
115b3(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal// ko sa la dang sna rtse dang // dran dang rgya ma rnam dag pa// rdo rje hUM mdzad kyis 'khyud pa// chang thung ma la phyag 'tshalo// ka ling+ga dang kha'i phyogs dang // gnye ma dang ni ting 'dzin stobs// rab tu bzang dang snyoms
115b4(rgyud 'grel): 'jug pa// sngo bsangs lha mo la phyag 'tshal// lam+bA ka dang mgrin gnas dang // grong pa dang ni shes rabo stobs// rdo rje bzang gis 'khyud bzhugs sam// shin tu bzang mo la phyag 'tshal// kAny+tsi dang ni snying phyogs
115b5(rgyud 'grel): gnas// bshang dang ting 'dzin yan lag dag/ 'jigs byed chen pos yang dag 'khyud// rta rna ma la bdag phyag 'tshal// haM mA la ya 'doms par dang // brtson 'grus mtshan rtse rnam dag pa// mig mi bzang ldan
115b6(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro ma// bya gdong ma la phyag 'tshalo// sku yi 'khor lor pre ta pur// dkar mo bad kan mtshan mau dang // dga' ba rnam dag 'khor shugs ma// stobs chen ldan la phyag 'tshalo// gr-i ha de ba bshang lam
116a1(rgyud 'grel): dang // rnag dang chos rnams 'byed bdag nyid// rin chen rdo rjes yang dag 'khyud// dum skyes ma la phyag 'tshalo// sau rASh+Ta brla gnyis gnas// khrag dang dran pa rnam dag pa// rta mgrin dang ldan mkha' 'gro
116a2(rgyud 'grel): ma/ chang 'tshong ma la phyag 'tshalo// su war+N+Na dI byin par gnas// rdul dang btang snyoms yan lag dang // na mkha'i snying por 'khyud mdzad ma// 'khor lo'i go cha mar phyag 'tshal// nA gar sor mo tshol dang ni// shin tu sbyangs
116a3(rgyud 'grel): pa rnam dag pa// he ru ka dpal snyoms 'jug paM// shin tu dpa' mo la phyag 'tshal// sin+d+hu rkang pa'i bol dang ni// yang dag lta dang mchi ma sbyangs// pad+ma gar dbang phyug dang ldan// stobs chen ma la phyag 'tshalo// ma re mthe
116a4(rgyud 'grel): bong steng dang ni// yang dag rtog pa mchil ma dag/ rnam snang mdzad dang snyoms 'jug pa// 'khor lo sgyur ma la phyag 'tshal// ku lu tA dang pus mor gnas// snabs dang yang dag ngag dag pa// rdo rje sems dpa' snyoms
116a5(rgyud 'grel): 'jug pa// brtson chen ma la bdag phyag 'tshal// nyid kyil srog med lnga gnas pa// g.yon pa la sogs go rimos kyis// gri gug dang ni thod pa 'chang // phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// spyan gsum lhan cig skyes
116a6(rgyud 'grel): dga' bas// thugs ni yang ngag mnyos mdzad pa// thugs gsung sku yi mkha' 'gro ma// gnag dang dmar dkar la phyag 'tshalo// shar sgor nyi ma la gnas pa// mkha' 'gro ma mtshungs 'od mnga' ma// khro mo gro gus
116b1(rgyud 'grel): b+h+yo pa 'chang // khyA g+ha d+mong ma la phyag 'tshalo// g.yon sbyor nyi ma la bzhugs pa// lA ma dang 'dra'i 'od mnga' ma// wa ma gr-I gug thod pa 'chang // 'ug gdong ma la phyag 'tshal// nAb skur rna ma la bzhugs pa// dum smras ma
116b2(rgyud 'grel): yi 'od 'dum// khro mo gri grug thong pa 'chang // lci gdong ma la phyag 'tsha lo// b+hi skar nyi ma la bzhugs pa// gzugs can 'dra ba'i glid mngar ma/ khro ma gri grag thong pa 'chang // phyag gang
116b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshalo// yang dag las dang yang dag 'tsho// rtsol dang dran pa yang dag ldan// sgo skyong ma ni bzhi po la// de goms theb phyir bdag phyag 'tshal// shar lho yi ni mtshams bzhugs pa// gnag dang ser ba'i 'od mang gA/ drag
116b4(rgyud 'grel): mo gri gug thod pa 'chang // gshin rje brtan mar phyag 'tshalo// lho dang nub kyi mtshams bzhugs pa// ser dang dmar ba'i 'od mnga' bo// drag po gri gug thod pa 'chang // gshin rje pho nya mo la 'dud// nub dang byang gi
116b5(rgyud 'grel): mtshams bzhugs pa// dmar dang ldang ba'i 'od mnga' ba// drag mo gri gug thod pa 'chang // gshin rje mche ba mar phyag 'tshal// byang dang shar gyi mtshams bzhugs pa// ljang dang gnag pa'i 'od mnga' ba// drug mo gri gug
116b6(rgyud 'grel): thod pa 'chang // gshin rje 'joms me la phyag 'tshal// ma skyes pa dang skyes pa dang // sdig pa mi bskyed 'joms pa'i phyir// de bzhin dge ba bskyed pa dang // de bzhin gnas dang spel ba byed// rnam shes chog brgyad
117a1(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'i phyir// 'bad dang rtsol ba rab mdzad pa'i// 'jig rten chos rnams rnas mnyam phyir// skra stong rnams la bdag phyag 'tshal// lus dang ngagra dang yod dag pa'o// dur khrod brgyad kyi rnam
117a2(rgyud 'grel): par brgyan// ma lus mkha' 'gro'i 'khor lo la// lus ngag yid kyis phyag 'tshal bstod// chos dang longs spyod sprul pa dang // bde ba chen po rnam dag pa// sgrib pa'i dri sogs dag pa'i sems// gang de yang
117a3(rgyud 'grel): ngag rnam par gnas// ye shes 'khor lo thugs 'khor lo// gsung dang sku yi 'khor lo dang // de bzhin dam tshigo 'khor lo la// gnas kun bdag nyid phyag 'tshalo// nga rgyal zhe sdang 'dod chags che// gti mug phrag
117a4(rgyud 'grel): dog rnam dag pa// rin chen mi bskyod rta mgrin dang // rtag pa rta bdag rim pa yis// rnam shes ye shes rnam dag pa// dam tshig che dang 'byung bar grags// phung po khams kyi ngo bo nyid// 'khor lo lnga po la phyag 'tshal
117a5(rgyud 'grel): mkha' spyod dang ni sa spyod dang // de bzhin sa 'og gnas pa dang // kun rdzob dang ni don dam dag/ 'khor lo lnga lnga bdag phyag 'tshal// thim dang longs spyod bdag po yis// gnas ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi la// skye dang 'dzag dang
117a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa dang // chos dang longs spyod sprul pa ste// 'dis ni khams gsum thams cad la// sngags dang dbyings dang chos dag gis// rtag tu khyab nas yang dag gnas// bde mchog dpal cho gas phyag 'tshal nas
117b1(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan bde mchog ces bya ba'i// de ltar dkyil 'khor bstod byas pas// bsod nams gang thob de yis ni// 'gro rnams de yi rang bzhin shog/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bstod pa zhes bya ba
117b2(rgyud 'grel): paN+Di ta b+hu rA ka la sh+yas mdzad pa rdzogs// zhu chen gyi la smai pa bsod nams bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// / rgya gar skad du/ shrI tsak+ka sam+ba ra maN+Da la de ba ge Na sto tran ma/ bod skad du/ dpal 'khor lo
117b3(rgyud 'grel): sdom pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs la bstod pa zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo// lha mo 'khor lo dang ldan pa'i// mkha' 'gro dpa' bo dpa' mo dang // dag pa'i chos kyi dri med pa// khrag 'thung mgon
117b4(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dpal// rnam par snang mdzad rigs las byung // sum cu rtsa bdun yang dag spro// rdo rje phag mo phyag 'tshalo// lus dang tsher dang sems dang chos// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i
117b5(rgyud 'grel): dngos// mkha' 'gro lA ma dum skyes ma// gzugs can ma la phyag 'tshalo// pad+ma'i dbus kyi bcom ldan 'das// phyogs kyi lha mo chen mo bzhi// mtshams kyi ngag ni snod bzhi po// zhal bzhi dag la phyag 'tshalo// sen
117b6(rgyud 'grel): mo so la thong dum gnas// 'dun po'i rdzu 'phrul rkang gang ba byed// rab gtum mo ni mgo la gnas// pre waM ra mar phyag 'tshal bstod// keng rus chen po yang dag bzhugs// gtum mig ma ni sgra dang spro// brtson 'grus
118a1(rgyud 'grel): 'phrul spyi gtsug la// dz+wa lan d+ha rar phyag 'tshal bstod// dpa' mo pags pa dri ma dang / dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul keng rus can// 'od ldan ma ni rna g.yas gnas// oM Di ya nor phyag 'tshal bstod/
118a2(rgyud 'grel): an+d+ra da ni rgyab tshigs la// sna chen ma ni rnal 'byor ma// sha la mche gtsigs sems rdzu 'phrul// bde ba'i gnas la phyag 'chal bstod// lha mo rtsa dang rgyus pa la// dad pa'i dbang po dpa' bo la// rna ba dag ni g.yon pa la
118a3(rgyud 'grel): nye ba'i gnas la phyag 'tshal bstod// brtson 'grus dbang po nye ba'i gnas// 'od dpag ming ni rus pa la// mi'u thu nga ma ni smin ma'i dbus// mar me ma la phyag 'tshalo// mchin pa la ni dran dbang po// lang ka'i dbang
118a4(rgyud 'grel): phyug rdo rje'i 'od// de bi ko Ti mig gnyis la// nye ba'i gnas la phyag 'tshalo// ting 'dzin dbang po shing grib ma// phrag pa la ni nye ba'i gnas// snying ga la ni rdo rje'i sku// mA la bar ni phyag 'tshalo// thugs kyi 'khor lo'i
118a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas 'di dag/ mkha' la spyod pa'i rnam dag pa// phyogs dang mtshamasu nag por zhugs// de la rtag tu phyag 'tshalho// shes rab dbang pos srungs ma// mtshan khung lnga ni gnas pa ste// myu gu can ni mig la gnas// kA
118a6(rgyud 'grel): ma ru par phyag 'tshalo// ngang po'i stobs ni 'jigs byed che// nu ma la ni gnas pa ste// mkhris pa rdo rje ral pa can// oM Ter zhing la phyag 'tshalo// brtson 'grus stobs ni rlung shugs ma// lte ba la ni gnas pa ste// glo ba la
118b1(rgyud 'grel): ni dpa' bo che// tri sha ku ner phyag 'tshalo// dran pa'i stobs ni chang 'thung ma// sna rtse la ni rab tu gnas// rgyu ma rdo rje hUM mdzad de// ko sar nye zhing phyag 'tshalo// ting 'dzin stobs ni sngo bsangs ma// tshan do ha ni kha la
118b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs// gnye ma la ni rab tu bzang // ka ling ga la phyag 'tshalo// shin tu bzang mo shes rab stobs// tshan+do ha ni mgrin pa'i dbus// grong pa la ni rdo rje bzang // lam+ba ka la phyag 'tshalo// ting 'dzin yan lag
118b3(rgyud 'grel): rta rnam// kAny+tsir snying la gnas pa ste// bshang ba la ni 'jigs byed che// nye chen ngo la phyag 'tshalo// hi mA la yar mtshan ma'i rtse// brtson 'grus yang dag bya gdong ma// gsang ba'i sbubs la mig mi bzung // nye tshan
118b4(rgyud 'grel): do la phyag 'tshalo// gsung gi 'khor lor yang dag gnas// sau spyod ting 'dzin yang dog gnas// kha dog dmar po phyogs mtshams na// yang dag bzhugs la phyag 'tshalo// pre ta mtshan ma 'khor lo shugs//
118b5(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba yang dag byang chub lam// bad kan la ni stobs po che// 'du ba can la phyag 'tshalo// gr-i ha bshang lam dum skyes bzhugs// shin tu sbyangs pa byang chub lam// rnag la rin chen rdo rje ste// 'du ba can la
118b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshalo// sau rahI brla gnyis la// nye bar gnas pa'i 'du can du// chos rab 'byed pa chang 'tshong ma// rta mgrin khrag la phyag 'tshalo// gser gling dag ni byin pa la// dran pa 'khor lo'i go cha ma// rdul ni nam
119a1(rgyud 'grel): mkha'i snying po ste// nye ba'i 'dul phyag 'tshalo// shin tu dpa' mos legs par 'khyud// btang snyoms yang dag sor mo la// tshil naM he ra ka dpal te// dur khrod grags la phyag 'tshal/
119a2(rgyud 'grel): sim+b+ha rkang pa'i bol la ni// yang dag lta baM stobs tshan me// mchin pa pad+ma gar dbang phyug/ dur khrod grags la phyag 'tshalo// mchil ma dpa' bo rnam snang mdzad// 'khor lo sgyur baM yang dag rtog/ mthe bong gnyis la
119a3(rgyud 'grel): nye dur khrod// ma nor gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// ku lu tA ra ni yang dag ngag/ brtsen chen ma ni pus mo la// snrubs la rdo rje sems dpa' ste// nye dur khrod l-i phyag 'tshalo// 'di ni sku yi 'khor lo ste// sa 'og spyod par
119a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa yin// phyogs dang mtshams na dkar por gnas// de la rtag tu phyag 'tshalo// yang dag las dang 'chi ba dang // yang dag rtsol ba dran pa dag/ khwa dang 'ug pa khyi dang phag/ sgom bzhi la phyag 'tshalo// yang dag
119a5(rgyud 'grel): spong bzhi rnam dag po// gshin rje brtan ma pho nya mo// gshin rje mchom gshin rje 'joms// mtshams ma bzhi la phyag 'tshalo// bsam gtan dkyil 'khor bsrung don du// 'di brgyad kyis ni bgegs sbyangs//
119a6(rgyud 'grel): bde mchog 'khor lo bstod pa yis// dge bas bdud bzhi'i dgra bcom ste// lha tshogs lha mo khrir gyur nas// bsam tshogs stobs mkhan ldan gyur cig/ dpal 'khor lo sdom po'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs la
119b1(rgyud 'grel): bstod pa zhes bya ba kha che'i mkhas pa chen po bram ze rin chen rdo rje mdzad pa rdzog so// // ma hA dz+nyA na dang / myur pa chos kyi dbang phyug gi bsgyur// rgya gar skad du/ shrI tsakra sam+b+ha ra sto dz+dza/ bong
119b2(rgyud 'grel): skad du/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa la bstod pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor lo sdom pa la phyag 'tshalo// kun rtog spros bral dri ma rnam dag cing // mtsho lhar bde ba chen por ro gcig pa// na mkha'i ngang du sprin dkar
119b3(rgyud 'grel): dag pa bzhin// rang bzhin rnam dag chos rnams mngon gyur te// ji ltar mkha' la 'ja' tshon shar ba bzhin// gnyis med bde chen longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// yid bzhin nor bu rtog med ji bzhin du// gdul bya/
119b4(rgyud 'grel): mchog la sprul sku khro bo'i tshul// dpa' bo 'jigs byed gar dgu'i nyams dang ldan// sku yi rang bzhin mtshan dang dpe byad ni// sgeg dang dpa' dang 'jigasu rung ba'i tshul// gsung gi rang bzhin yan lag drug cu ni//
119b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhad dang gshe dang rngam pa'i tshul du bstan// thugs kyi rang bzhin gzugs dang ting nge 'dzin// zhi ba sems dpa' rmad du byung ba'i tshul// dbang phyug chen po'i sgeg pa'i nyams bcom nas// gnyis med yum la 'gyud
119b6(rgyud 'grel): nas 'gying bag bzhugs// gzhon nu gdong drug dpa' ba'i nyams bcom nas// 'jigs byed dus mtshan g.yas brkyang zha thos kyis mnan// khyab 'jug zhal gsum 'jigs pa'i nyams bcom nas// zhal bzhi mnga'
120a1(rgyud 'grel): zhing bcu gnyis phyag dang ldan// lha chen tshangs pa rgod pa'i nyams bcom nas// g.yas pa ser po bzhad pa'i tshul du bstan// tshogs kyi bdag po'i gshe ba'i nyams bcom nas/
120a2(rgyud 'grel): glang chen pags pas brgyan byas mche ba gtsigs// sgra gcan lha min nyi zla khar bcug nas// rngam pa'i nyams bcom tshangs pa'i mgo bo bsnams// brgya byin spyan mang zhi ba'i nyams bcom nus// sku la spyan
120a3(rgyud 'grel): gsum gzi brjid ldan pa po// me lha tshangs pa zhi ba'i nyams bcom nas// thal ba'i tshem bus sku la brgyan pa po// klu chen se sha rmad byung nyams bcom nas// mi mgo lnga bcu gcig gi ngo shel byas//
120a4(rgyud 'grel): sku gsung thugs le sdug bsngal gsum nub pas// thams cad bde ba chen por thugasu chud// yang dag ting 'dzin rang bzhin bcom ldan 'das// 'khor lo'i dbus na g.yas brkyang sbyor bas bzhugs// chos
120a5(rgyud 'grel): nyid mi 'gyur sku mdog mthing kar bstan// thabs kyi tshul gyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa// thugs rje mchog gyur de la phyag 'tshal lo// de yi yum gyur rdo rje phag mo ni// sku mngag dmar mo zhal gcig phyag
120a6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis ma// bdung bzhi bcom nas bde chen thugs chung mo// gnyis med yum gyur de la phyag 'tshalo// zhi sogs las mdzad ye shes bzhi yi sgo// tshad med bzhi dang phyag rgya bzhi ldan ma// phyogs bzhi pa
120b1(rgyud 'grel): dbus na bzhugs pa yi// mkha' 'gro yum bzhi mo la phyag 'tshalo// rtag pa la sogs de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi// bum pa bzhi dang bdud rtsis gang ba'i snod// mtshams bzhir mchod pa'i gzugs
120b2(rgyud 'grel): kyis gnas pa yi// thabs shes dbyer med de la phyag 'tshal lo// sems ni skye ba med par thugs chud cing // mi bskyong rigs sku mdog mthing gar bstan// rnam thar brgyad rtsibs thugs rtag rdo rjes
120b3(rgyud 'grel): brgyan// mkha' spyod yab yum rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// gsung gi sgra snyun lto bu thugs chung cing // 'od dpag med rigs sku mdog dmar por bstan// rnam thar brgyad rtsibs gsung rtags pad+mas
120b4(rgyud 'grel): brgyan// sa spyod yab yumaM rnams la phyag 'tshalo// sku ni sgyu mo lta gu thugs chung tsong // rnam ngag ri gsu sku mdog dkar por bstan// rnam thar brgyad rtsibs sku rtags 'khor los brgyan// sa 'og
120b5(rgyud 'grel): yab yum rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// gshin rje brtan sogs khro mo chen mo brgyud// mi 'am ci sogs gdul phyir tha dad bzhugs// kha gdang la sogs lha mo brgyad po rnams// dam tshig 'khor lor bzhug
120b6(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshalo// rin chen las grub dpag med gzhal yas khang // byang chub mchog gi chos rnams yongs rdzogs pa// gtso bo bde chen thugs kyi snang ba ni// sna tshogs brgyan dang lha mo'i tshigs kyis mdzes//
121a1(rgyud 'grel): chos rnams tshad mang dur khrod brgyad kyis bskor// rnam par gzigs shing tha dad gdong du bstan// nyan thos rang rgyal 'khor lo sgyur sogs brgyud// phyogs rnams skyong zhing klu dang
121a2(rgyud 'grel): srin po'i gzugs// thugs rjes nyon mongs bsregs mdzad 'bar ba'i phreng // rnam snang rang bzhin thar pa'i grong khyer mchog/ bde chen bzhugs gnas de la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das dpal 'khor
121a3(rgyud 'grel): lo sdom pa la bstod pa/ kha che'i paN+Di ta chen po bram ze rin chen rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta ma hA dz+nyA na dang / bod kyi l-i ts+tsha ba mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug gis bsgyur ba'o//
121a4(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ shrI tsakra sam+b+ha ra stot+ta nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i bstod pa zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// hUM chos nyid dbyings las bzhengs pa'i sku mchog ni// nyon
121a5(rgyud 'grel): mongs rnam ngag ye shes sku bzlas shing // dus mtha'i me dpung lta bu'i klong dkyil nas// ri rab chu skyes nyi ma'i gdan snang ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis dpa' bo chen po'i sku// zhabos gnyis brkyang bskum 'jigs byed dus
121a6(rgyud 'grel): mtshan mnan// sku mdog mthing kha mtha' ltar dag pa'i 'ong // gcer bu glang chen stag gi sham thabs can// zhal gdangs tshems gcig hUM gi 'brug sgra sgrogs// da pral ba'i khro gnyer spyan gsum glog ltar 'khyum/
121b1(rgyud 'grel): ral pa'o thor tshugs zla phyed rdo rje dang // thod pa nor bu mo bskyod rtags kyis mdzes// sgeg pa dpa' bo 'jigasu rung ba dang // rgyud dang gA sh+ye dang rngam pa'i ngang tshul can// snying rje zhi dang rmad du byung ba'i nyams// gAr b+hi rnam
121b2(rgyud 'grel): 'phrul na mkha' khyab par ston// 'khor lo rna cha mgul rgyan gdub kor dang // ske rags thal chen tshangs pa'i skud pa can// mi mgo'i ngo shal rdo rje dril bu 'khyud// dpal ldan he rA kA la phyag 'tshalo// gnyis med
121b3(rgyud 'grel): tshul gyis bcom ldan 'das ma yang // sku mdog dmar mo gcer bu skra grol zhing // phyag rgya lnga dang rdo rje thod pa 'khyud// phung po khams dang skye mched rang bzhin la// ma lus rgyal ba'i rigs rnams yongasu rdzogs//
121b4(rgyud 'grel): srid pa rnam dag sku yi yan lag la// nyi shu rtsa bzhi yul gyi rnam par brgyan// khyod ni khams kyi rang bzhin dpa' bo dang // rtsa yi rang bzhin dpo' mo nyi shu bzhi// bye ba'i grangs slong ma lus 'khor bcas kun// gnas dang
121b5(rgyud 'grel): zheganas zhing dang nyo zhing sogs// sa bcu'i gnas su gnyis med dgyes par rol// bde chen longs spyod rdzogs la rnam rol zhing // rnam dag skye mched las kyang 'khor lo bzhi// lus kyi rnam ngag rang bzhin gzhan
121b6(rgyud 'grel): yas khang // rnam shes brgyad las sprul pa'i dur khrod brgyad// dngos dang dngos min rang bzhin bcom ldan 'das// kun gyi bdag nyid rnal 'byor dbang phyug gtso// ma lus gcig tu 'dus pa'i skur gyur pa// dpal
122a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan khrag 'thung khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod kyi 'od zer glog tsam mthong ba las// ngo mtshar 'dzin pa'i yid kyis bdag bstod na// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i 'gro ba ma lus kun// mgon po
122a2(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyis thugs rjes bzung du gsol// dam tshig brtul zhugs spyod pa'i rnal 'byor la// brtse ba'i thugs kyis bu bzhin dgongs nas kyang // bar chang bdud dpung zhi bar mdzad du gsol// dur khrod la sogs gnas
122a3(rgyud 'grel): su srog dor nas// khyod kyi rnal 'byor rtag tu brtson pa la// ye shes yar ngo zla ltar 'phel ba dang // dngos grub tshul bzhin grub par mdzad du gsol// sangs rgyas phrin las byed pa'i rnal 'byor la// mkhyen
122a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'od lta bur rab rgyos twa// yon tan gzi brjid chen po bskyed du gsol// mtha' khob kra gro'i gnas su 'khyam pa dang // log rtogs bdud kyi bcings pa'i sems can+da rnams// khyod kyi rnam sbal mthong
122a5(rgyud 'grel): thos dran pas kyang // mgon po khyod kyis gdul byar gzung ngu gsol// / dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i bstod pa slob dpon maM tri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
123a1(rgyud 'grel): dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i bstong pa bzhugs so//
123b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyu gar skad du/ shrI tsakra saM pa ra sto tA/ bod skad du/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i bstod pa/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa la phyag 'tshalo// chos nyid dpying las bzhengs pa'i sku mchog ni// skal ba'i
123b2(rgyud 'grel): me ltar 'ab ra ba'i klong dkyil na// ri rab chu skyes nyi zla'i gdan steng du// 'jigs byed dus mtshan brgyad bkug zhabs kyis mnan// sku mdog mthing nag mkha' ltor dag pa'i 'od // gcer bu glang chen stag
123b3(rgyud 'grel): gi sham thabs can// zhal gdangs mche gtsigs hUM gi 'brug sgra sgrog/ dpral ba'i khro gnyer spyan gsum klog ltar 'gyu// ral pa'i thor cog zla phyed rdo rje dang // thod pa nor bu mi skyong ngar gyis mdzes//
123b4(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bo sgeg pa rab tu 'jigs byed cing // rgod dang go shwe dang rngam pa'i ngang tshul can// snying rje zhi dang rmad du byung ba'i nyams// gar gyi rnam 'phrul na mkha' khyab par ston// 'khor lo rna cha mgul rgyan gdub
123b5(rgyud 'grel): kor dang // ske rags thal chen tshangs pa'i skud pa can// mi mgo'i do shal rdo rje dril bu 'khyud// dpal ldan he ru ka la phyag 'tshalo// gnyis meng tshul gyis bcom ldan 'das ma yang // sku mdog dmar
123b6(rgyud 'grel): mo gcer bu skra grol zhing // phyag rgya lnga dang rdo rje thod pa 'khyud // phung po khams dang skye mtshang rang bzhin la// ma lus rgyal ba'i rigs rnams yongasu rdzogs// srid pa rnam dag sku yi yan lag la// nyi shu
124a1(rgyud 'grel): rtsa bzhi yul gyi rnam par brgyan// khyod ni khams kyi rang bzhin dpa' bo dang // rtsa yi rang bzhin dpa' mo nyi shu bzhi// bye ba'i grangs snyed ma lus 'khor bcas kun// gnas dang nye gnas zhing dang
124a2(rgyud 'grel): nye zhing sogs// sa bcu'i gnas su gnyis med dgyes par rol// blang chen longs spyod rdzogs la rnam rol zhing // rnam dag skye mched las kyang 'khor lo bzhi// lus kyi rnam dag rang bzhin gzhal yas khang //
124a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam shes brgyad las sprul pa'i dur khrod brgyad// dngos dang dngos min rang bzhin bcom ldan 'das// kun gyi bdag nyid rnal 'byor dbang phyug gtso// ma lus gcig tu 'dus pa'i skur gyur pa// dpal ldan khrag
124a4(rgyud 'grel): 'thung khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod kyi 'od zer glog tsam mthong ba las// ngo mtshar 'dzin pa'i yid kyis bdag bstod na// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i 'gro ba ma lus kun// mgon po khyed kyi thugs rjes bzung du
124a5(rgyud 'grel): gsol// dam tshig brtul zhugs spyod pa'i rnal 'byor la// brtse ba'i thugs kyis bu bzhin dgongs nas kyang // bar chad bdud dpung zhi bar mdzad du gsol// dur khrod la sogs gnas su srog dor nas// khyod/
124a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi rnal 'byor rtag tu brtson pa la// ye shes yar ngo'i zla ltar 'phel ba dang // dngos grub tshul bzhin grub par mdzad du gsol// sangs rgyas phrin las byed pa'i rnal 'byor la// mkhyen pa nyi 'od lta bur rab rgyas
124b1(rgyud 'grel): te/ yon tan gzi brjid chen po bskyed du gsol// mtha' khob kla klo'i gnas su 'khyams pa dang // log rtog bdud kyis bcings pa'i sems can rnams// khyod kyi rnam sbrul mthong thos dran pas kyang // mgon
124b2(rgyud 'grel): po khyod kyis gdul byar gzung du gsol// dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i bstod pa slob dpon maM tI pas mdzad pa rdzogaso// // dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshalo// chos dbyings rnam dag dbyings las ma g.yos kyang
124b3(rgyud 'grel): thabs kyi khro bo'i skur ston gdug pa 'dul// che ba'i che mchog lha yi lhar gyur pa// kun bzang he ru ka la phyag 'tshalo// bdag med dbang phyug sku dang gnyis med cing // bde mchog 'od gsal dag pa'i dkyil 'khor
124b4(rgyud 'grel): nas// rgyal ba skyes bcas la sogs sprin 'phro ba// rdo rje phag mo'i sku la phyag 'tshalo// dus gsum bde bar gshegs pa'i ye shes sku// 'khor 'das stong par mdzad pa'i thugs rje yis// gdul bya kun
124b5(rgyud 'grel): mkhyen sa la 'gong mdzad pa'i// rigs lnga bde bar gshegs la phyag 'tshalo// nam mkha' lta bu thams cad thogs med cing // 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul lus dang ldan// thugs dam dbang gis bsgrub la
124b6(rgyud 'grel): brtsor dgongs pa// gnas gsum mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la phyag 'tsha lo// nyon mongs rnam dag ye shes sku brnyes pa// srid pa'i 'khor lo ma lus gcod pa'i phyir// thabs mkhas thugs rjes 'gro ba 'dren mdzad
125a1(rgyud 'grel): pa// rgyal gnyis rdo rje'i zhabs la dad pas 'dung // lha me'i longs spyod phran tshogs thams cad dang // kun tu bzang po'i mchod sprin chen po dang / gsang dang gsang rab gsang chen bla med kyi/
125a2(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa'i sprin chen rgya mtsho dag gis mchod// bdag gis lus dang ngag dang yid kyis kyang // chags dang zhe sdang rnam par rmongs sems kyis// srid pa nyam par sdig pa ci bgyis pa// des na sdig pa thams cad rab
125a3(rgyud 'grel): tu bshags// rdzogs snang sa rgyas mgon byang chub sems dpa' mchog/ 'phags pa rnams kyis dge ba gang bgyis pa// de dag bla med byang chub 'bras thob par// ma lus pa la rtag tu rjes yi rangs// rdzogs
125a4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rin chen rang gi sems gnas dang / rtog pa'i dra ba rab dral dam pa'i chos// sa dbang tshogs dang brtul zhugs dge 'dun la// rab tu dad pas bdag ni skyabasu mchi// rgyal dang rgyal nyid legs skyes de dag la
125a5(rgyud 'grel): kun nas kun tu bdag nyid bdag gis dbul// sems dpa' mchog gis bdag ni yongs bzhes shig/ dad pas bdag nyid khyed kyi 'bangasu mchi// blo bur nyon mongs tshigs kyis gdungs pa yis// bskyod pa'i skye bo
125a6(rgyud 'grel): mtha' dag bsgral bya'i phyir// dam chos bdud rtsi'i sngags rnams bshad pa ru// sman mchog mgon po la ni bdag gsolo// mchog tu mi dge ba ni rab bcom pas// bdud kyi skye rgan dang 'chi las grol// mya ngan
125b1(rgyud 'grel): 'da' bzhed gyur pa spang ba ni// spyan mchog mgon po lnga ni bdag gsol lo// sangs rgyas 'jig rten gang byung la// skal ldan byang chub sems dpa' yis// byang chub tu ni snyems bskyed ltar// de ring nyid du sems
125b2(rgyud 'grel): bskyed do// tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang // dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang // sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum// de bzhin brtan por gzung bar gyis// ji ltar phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba yis// sngon gyi bde
125b3(rgyud 'grel): gshegs grangs med la// thugs bsgreng dam tshig dpag med dag/ 'tshang rgya bar du ma btang ltar// bdag ni deng nas byang chub par// lus srog ltos pa med par yang // bslab 'di mgon bzhin bsrung la gnas/
125b4(rgyud 'grel): ye shes thugs kyis dgongasu gsol// rnam rtog ye shes lngar gyur pa// rtag tu bsten cing spyad par bya// rgyal ba rigs lnga'i brtul zhugs dag/ srog gi phyir yang mi gtong ngo // sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dag/ rtag
125b5(rgyud 'grel): tu mi phyed brtul zhugs gzung // rgyal bas dgongs te gsungs pa yi// dam tshig bzhi po bsrung bar bgyi// rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu bzhi sogs// rig sngags 'chang kun+da mi 'da' lhur// deng nas tha med byang chub par//
125b6(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis tshul bzhin bsrung bar bgyi// nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du// zla rer bcu phrag gnyis po dang // bco lnga la ni rab tu mchod// theg pa dman la 'dod mi bgyi// sems can la yang rgyab mi phyogs//
126a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba dag kyang mi spang zhing // mya ngan 'das la dgar mi 'gro/ dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma kun la// gus pas bsnyen bkur mchod par bgyi// bdag gis sems can thams cad la// brnyas pa
126a2(rgyud 'grel): nyid du mi bgyi'o// phyag rgya bzhon pa mtshon cha dang // mtshan ma 'gom par mi bgyi'o// bdag gis dus gsum dge ba ci spyad pas// na mkha'i mthas klas gyur pa'i sems can rnams// bla med theg pa chen po'i snod gyur
126a3(rgyud 'grel): nanunas/ kun kyang rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid shog/ skye zhing skye ba dag ni thams cad du// blo ldan rigs bzang nga rgyal med pa dang // snying rje che ldan bla ma la dad cing // 'khor lo bde mchog dam tshig la gnas shog/
126a4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dril bu la sogs rtag tu 'chang // zab cing rgya che'i chos ni rtogs pa dang // kak+ko shukra le sogs rtag za zhing // mthar thug theg chen sgrub pa'i skal ldan shog/ deng nas byang chub snying por mchis bar du// bcom
126a5(rgyud 'grel): ldan bde gshegs kun tu bzang po dang // gsang ba'i theg pa dbyer med rmad byung dang // mi 'bral tshul bzhin rtag tu bsgrub par shog/ sgrub mchog 'di la bar chad mi 'byung zhing // tshe 'di la sogs skye ba bdun par
126a6(rgyud 'grel): du// dpal ldan bde mchog 'khor lo chen po yi// zhabs rdul ze 'bru spyi gtsug gnas par shog/ gang tshe 'gro ba'i migon la blta ba dang // phyir zhing cung zad 'dri bar 'dod na yang // bcom ldan bde gshegs
126b1(rgyud 'grel): thugs kyi bdag po ni// thams cad sgrib med sa ler mthong bar shog/ phyogs bcu na mkha'i khams dang mnyam pa yi// sems can ma lus byang chub dgod pa'i phyir// thub pa'i dbang po'i spyod pa ji lta bar// bdag gi
126b2(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa'ang de dang 'dra bar shog/ sems can kun gyi sdug bsngal bdag la sbyin// bdag bde dge bas de kun pade thob shog/ tshe rab kun tu skyo gsum rin chen dang // bum bzang dpag bsam so sogs lta bur shog/
126b3(rgyud 'grel): mgon po kun mkhyen thugs rje'i byin brlabs dang // sgrub pa mchog la rtse gcig sbyangs pa yis// bde mchog mkha' 'gro'i dngos grub mchog thob nas// sems can thams cad smin pa'i mthu ldan shog/ dbang
126b4(rgyud 'grel): dang mngon shes so sor rig pa dang // gzungs dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo rtogs nus// nam mkha'i mthas klas gyur pa'i sems can rnams// gnas dang nye ba'i gnas sogs bgrod par shog/ ting 'dzin mang pos gdul
126b5(rgyud 'grel): bya'i rgyud mkhyen nas// thams cad mdun na sngags kyi gzugs kyis ni// sna tshogs na mkha' khyab pa'i chos bstan pas// zhing dang nye ba'i zhing sogs bgrod par shog/ bde gshegs spyan sngar gnas gsum mkha'
126b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro yis// dam bcas bsrung zhing dngos grub mchog rtsol ba'i// thugs ngam bzhin du rtag bsrung dngos grub ni// rnam gsum tshe 'di nyid la stsol bar shog/ 'chi tshe mgon dang dpa' bo ma tshogs kyis// me tog
127a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal mtshan gdugs sogs thogs nas kyang // rol mo glu dang sgra snyan tshogs mchod nas// mkha' la spyod pa'i gan su khrid par shog/ skad cig de la snang ba gsum thob nas// gsal dang rtags snang
127a2(rgyud 'grel): rang gi rigs rtogs te// dur khrod la sogs rgyal nyid sa thob nas// tshan do la sogs la bgrod par shog/ shin tu rnam par dag pa kun gyi mchog/ gdong nas rnam par grol ba de bzhin gshegs// kun tu bzang po kun
127a3(rgyud 'grel): gyi bdag po yi// sras kyi dbang po nyid du bdag gyur cig/ sa gsum mthar phyin gsum phrag gsum gnas gyur// shes brgyad gyur pas ye shes lhur gyur te// ye shes chos kyi dbyings dang dbyer med pa'o// chos sku
127a4(rgyud 'grel): byang chub snying po thob par shog/ chos dbyings las byung na mkha'i mtshan nyid 'dra// thog ma dang ni tha ma med pa'i bdag/ sems dpa' rdo rje thugs kyi bdag po ru// rdo rje sems dpa'o nyid du bdag gyur cig/ dngos grub
127a5(rgyud 'grel): mau lus pa ni kun gyi bdag/ dbang phyug chen po lha yi lhar gyur pa// stug po'i rgyan gyur ma lus kun gyi rgyal// mi 'gyur dam pa nyid du bdag gyur cig/ nyon mongs rnam ngag ye shes sku brnyes pas// 'dod chags kun
127a6(rgyud 'grel): gyi rjesu rab chags la// 'dod chags me kun rang bzhin rnam dag nas// gsung gi dbang phyug nyid du bdag gyur cig/ nga rgyal rnam dag mnyam nyid lhun gyis grub// yon tan yid bzhin rgya chen mkha' 'dra bas// gdul
127b1(rgyud 'grel): bya rdzogs sangs nyid du re skong ba// khyab bdag rdo rje nyi mar bdag gyur cig/ phrag dog dag pas bya ba grub brnyes shing // phrin las rgya mtshos gdul bya dpag med rnams// grub mchog phyag rgya che la 'gong mdzad pa'i// bde
127b2(rgyud 'grel): gshegs gdon mi za bar bdag gyur cig/ dus gsum bde bar gshegs pa kun gyi bdago/ dpal ldan pade mchog 'khor lo'i skur grub nas// nam mkha' dag dang mnyam pa'i mthu stobs kyis// 'khor bangs ma
127b3(rgyud 'grel): lus 'dren pa'i dpal du shog/ dpal 'khor lo bde mchog gi rgyun bshags rgyas pa slob dpon b+hA ri bse mdzad pa rdzogs// / jo bo rje dang lo ts+tsha ba rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// dpal
127b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshalo// bsnyen pa'i cho ga dang / sta goni gyi cho ga dang / dkyil 'khor gyi tshig dang / dbang bskur ba'i cho ga dang bzhi'o// bsnyen pa la dang po skabs dang dbye ba ni// slob ma dad pa dang shes rab dang
127b5(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa s+thA maN+Dal byas te/ phyag gsum byas lha me tog lan gsum dbul/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar bas slob dpon gyis bdag la bde mchog 'khor lo mngon par 'byung ba'i dkyil
127b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi rgyal po ro dbang bskor ba stsal du gsol zhes lan gsum bu// 'o na bdag gis bsnyen pa byi yis// khyod kyis rdzas sogaso shig ces gnang ba byin la// khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sngags bzlas pa'i
128a1(rgyud 'grel): sngagasu byin la srod tho rangs brgya rtsa zlos su gzhug go// de nas bdag nyid lu yi pa'i rnal 'byor ram/ dpa' bo gcig pa bsgom pa 'am/ mngal skyes kyi yang rung bas rdo rje dang ngo li yi
128a2(rgyud 'grel): bzlas pa bya/ thun bzhi'i rnal 'byor gyis spyir rtsa sngags 'bum phrag gcig gam/ yang na yab yum gyi snying po 'am nyi snying gang yang rung ba 'bum// 'khor gyi lha la khri khri sum b+ha nI 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pa ni
128a3(rgyud 'grel): grangs kyi bsnyen pa'o// yang na mtshon ma'i bsnyen pa rmi lam du lhas dbang bskur la rag ces gnang ba'am brdas kyang rung ngo // dbang med na bzlas pa du ma gcig byas la yid kyis lha mngon du dmigs te gnang
128a4(rgyud 'grel): byar bsams la byar rung ba ni bdag po'i bkas so// de'i tshe mchod pa lha dang gtor ma re ma chag par btang bar bya'o// de nas bskul ba'i phyir slob mas maN+Dal sngon du 'gro bas snga ma ltar zhu ba yang bya'o// rdzas
128a5(rgyud 'grel): tshogs sam ma tshogs zhes dri'o// kha cig ni tshogs la kha cig ni ma tshogs zhes zhu'o// de nas sdig pa bsal ba dang bsrung bar bya ba ni slob ma'i lte bar nyi ma la hUM sngon po bsams la yang de'i snying gar sdig pa
128a6(rgyud 'grel): kaM nag po las sha za'i gzugs ring pa rkang lag phra ba/ skra gyen du brdzes pa bsams la hUM gis 'od kyis gyen du phul te/ sna bugo g.yas nas byung ba dang / hUM ngo sgo mtshams kyi lha mo brgyad du gyur nas/
128b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis gri gug gis bgos nas zos te/ yang hUM du song nas sna bug de nyid nas slar thim par bsam// bsrung ba ni lag pa g.yon par ha byas pas/ rdo rje rgya gram bsams la de slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag nas
128b2(rgyud 'grel): lus rdo rjer song bar bsam/ su b+ha nI brgya rtswa brgyad bzlas pa rdo rje rgyu grum yang de'i spyi bor gnas par bsam// de nas de dag skad cig mas phyog gnyis pa'i he ru kar bsams la mchod pa dang gtor ma la
128b3(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa byas te/ mdun du slob ma'i gtso bo la sogs pas me N+Dal byed pa sngon du 'gro bas phyag byed du bcug la thal mo bskyed par bya ste/ dkon mchog gsum la sgrubs mchi// sdig pa thams cad so sor
128b4(rgyud 'grel): bshags// 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang // sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung // byang chub mchog gi sems ni bdag gis bsgreng // sems can thams cad bdag gi mgron du gnyer// byang chub spyod mchog
128b5(rgyud 'grel): yid 'ong spyad pa yis// 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par sheg/ ces lan gosu ma brjod do// de nas snying ga dang / lkog mo dang spyi bor dri'i thig le gsum byas la rdo rje reg pa skyon du 'gro bas hUM AHaM
128b6(rgyud 'grel): shes brjod cing rim pa bzhin du pad+ma dang 'khor lo dag la yi ge gsum po de nyid rim pa bzhin du mtshan pa/ 'og ma gnyis nyi ma la/ 'khor lo la zla ba bsam par bya// de nas oM pudz+ra oM a zhes bya ba la sogs pa
129a1(rgyud 'grel): brjod pas yul nyer bzhir lag pa g.yon pa'i srin lag gi reg bzhin du yul de dang / de'i gnas rnams mos par bya'o// de nas skyes pa la ni snying ga la sogs par oM hA la sogs pa
129a2(rgyud 'grel): bsam zhing bud med la ni lte ba la sogs par oM baM la stsogs pas byin gyis brlab par bya'o// de nas de dag la mchod pa bya ste/ me tog ni mgo bo la'o// spos ni shangs la'o// mar me nI spyan la'o// dri ni thugs
129a3(rgyud 'grel): kar ro// zhal zas ni zhal du dmigs te'o// de yang oM AHbadz+ra puSh+pe hUM zhes bya ba la sogs pas so// de nas tshems shing dor bar bya ste/ mdun du pa lang gi ko ba tsam dus gzhi pa'i lci ba sar pas byugs
129a4(rgyud 'grel): la pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa khyams gru bzhi'i nang du chud pa bris pa la me tog gi tshim bu dgu bkod nas/ der slob ma shar ram byang du kha blta bas tshems shing ma yo ba ma gas pa/ lo 'dab kyis kha brgyan pa can/
129a5(rgyud 'grel): tsan dan gyis byugs pa lA/ me tog gi phreng ba bcings la/ oM badz+ra dan+ta kAb+d+ha bI ma la bi shud+d+he swA hA zhes bya bas gtad pa/ cho ga bzhin bcas nas/ thal mo'i bar nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dor du gzhug
129a6(rgyud 'grel): go/ 'dir tshems shing gi mtshan ma brtag par bya ste/ shar du bltas ni zhi ba'i dngos gru'o// byang du bltas na rgyas pa'o// nub tu bltas na dbang ngo // lhor bltas na mngon spyod do// gyen du bltas na rig pa
129b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa lha'i dngos grub bo// thur du bltas na 'og gi dngos grub bo// dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol tu song na dngos grub med do zhes brtag par bya'o// de nas ngag dag pa'i don du bdud rtsi lnga dang sbyar ba'i dri'i tshu la
129b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo kun gyi rnal 'byor ma bzlas te/ de nas oM hrIHbi shud+d+ha d+harmAHsarba pA paM naM tsa a swA bi sho d+ha ya sarba ba~M kalpa a pa nA yaM hUM zhes brjod pas/ lag pa g.yon pa'o khyor bar lan gsum blang bar bya'o//
129b3(rgyud 'grel): de nas yi ge nyer gnyis pa'i sngags lan gsum bzlas pa'i ku shi sngas dang stan gyi phyir byin la/ rang rang gi mi gang dang lag tshad kyi skud pa sum sgril byas la gsum pa gsum gyis mdud pa byas te/ snying po'i sngags
129b4(rgyud 'grel): lAldan+da bdun bzlas la dpung par bcing par bya'o// de nas chos bshad pas spyo ba skyed par bya ste/ 'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen rnams// u dum+bA ri'i me tog bzhin// brgya lam na 'am res 'ga' zhig/ 'byung 'gyur yang
129b5(rgyud 'grel): ni mi 'byung ngo // gsung sngags spyod pa'i tshul 'byung ba// de bas kyang ni dkon pa ste// gang gis mtshungs med sems can don// mya ngan mo 'dab byed par nus// bskal pa bye ba du mar ni// skyon chad sdig pa gang byas
129b6(rgyud 'grel): pa// de kun dkyil 'khor 'di 'dra bo// mthong bas kyang de byang 'gyur na// grags pa mtha' yas gsang sngags kyi// tshul la spyod pa smos ci 'go so// skyob pa'i gsang sngags bzlas na ni// go 'phang bla na med par 'gyur/
130a1(rgyud 'grel): gang dag spyod pa mchog 'di la// blo gros shin tu dri med pa// de dag gis ni ngan 'gro'i rgyun// sdug bsngal kun 'byung rab tu bcang // gang gis khyed rnams sras bcas pa'i// rgyal ba rnams kyis
130a2(rgyud 'grel): bstan 'di la// bdag nyid chen po khyod rnams kyis// rnyed pa mnyam med de ring rnyed// theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba'i// lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan// gang gis khyed rnams 'byung 'gyur ba// de bzhin gshegs pa
130a3(rgyud 'grel): rnamasu 'gyur// zhes bya ba dag gis dam pa'i chos bsgrags pa byas nas// su ma b+ha ni sa bsrung ba byas te// tho rangs kyi rmyi lam ci mthong ba kho bo lnga zlos shig byas nas/ dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi'i mthar seng+ga'i nyal tha
130a4(rgyud 'grel): kyis nyal du gzhug// slob dpon dkyil 'khor gyi khang par zhugs te/ bsrung ba'i don du suM b+ha ni bzlas par bya'o// zhes bya ba ni slob ma sta gon du gnas pa'i cho ga'o// / de nas bum pa sta gon du gnas pa brjod
130a5(rgyud 'grel): par bya ste/ re zhig bum pa bcu 'am drug gam gnyis sram gcig kyang rung ste/ rtsa ba dang nag po la sogs pa'i skyon med pa/ gser ram dngul lam kham pa la sogs pa'i rgyu las byas pa/ kha dog dkar por bsgyur
130a6(rgyud 'grel): pa rigs kyi mtshan mas mtshan pa/ 'o ma can gyi shing gis kha brgyan pa/ rigs kyi sku mdog mthun pa'i gos kyis mgul pa dkris pa/ bsti gnas kyi chu 'o ma can gyis gang ba/ tson ngan dang ga pur dang / gur gum
130b1(rgyud 'grel): dang / grwa r+N+Na dang du lu kA s+t+wa~M d+hI lnga dang bcas pa/ bdud rtsi lnga dang rin po che lha dang / 'bru lnga dang sman lngas gang ba'i snod steng du bzhag ste/ 'og tu pad ma'i gdan steng du gdugs phub la/ dkyil 'khor du rim pa bzhin mang
130b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kun gyi mkha' 'gro ma re ri bzlas te bzhag la lhag par gnas par bya'o// re zhig bum pa bcu'i lugs la ni/ rnam par rgyal ba la gcig/ pad+ma'i snod bzhi dang bcas pa'i yum bzhi la re re/ thugs dang gsung dang sku dang /
130b3(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig gi 'khor lo rnams la re ri ste/ de ltar na dgu'o// las thams cad pa dang bcu'o// drug gi lugs la 'khor lo lnga la re re rnam par rgyal ba dang drug go// las thams cad pa dam tshig gi 'khor bsdu'o// gnyis pa
130b4(rgyud 'grel): ni thabs dang shes rab kyi dbye bas so// las thams cad pa ni gtso bo la bsdu'o// gcig gi lugs la ni dkyil 'khor gyi lha ma lus pa gcig tu bsdu zhing las thams cad pa yang der bsdus te/ de ni khyim pa dbang
130b5(rgyud 'grel): bskur ba la yin gyi/ dge tshul yan chad la ma yin no// gcig gis ma yin par rgyud lasna bkag pa'i phyir ro// rtsa ba ni dbyibs kyi skyon no// nag po ni kha dog skyon te de dag med pa'o// tshad kyang mchur sor nyer gcig/
130b6(rgyud 'grel): zheng du bcu drug/ gce'u med pa'o mgrin pa la sor drug go// mchu la sor brgyado// mgrin pa'i sbubs la sor gnyis so// mngon spyod la sogs pa'i phrin las gzhan la ni tshad gzhan dang gzhan du brjod do// dkar
131a1(rgyud 'grel): por bsgyur ba ni rang bzhin gyis kha dog dkar po med pa la'o// rigs kyi mtshan ma rnam par rgyal ba la ni chos 'byung gi dbus su sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte ba ra ka pA la'i nang du chud pa'i rdo rje
131a2(rgyud 'grel): dang rdo rje gri gug go// rigs kyi yum bzhi la ni gri gug dang ka pA la'o// thugs kyi 'khor lo la rdo rje dang gri gug go// gsung gi 'khor lo la pad+ma dang gri gug go/ sku'i 'khor lo la 'khor lo dang gr-i gug go/
131a3(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig gi 'khor lo la ka pA la dang gri gug go/ las thams cang la ni sna tshogs rdo rje dang gri gug go/ 'o ma can gyi shing ni ts+tsha ta la sogs pa'o// rin po che sna lnga ni gser dang dngul dang mu men dang mu tig dang
131a4(rgyud 'grel): byi ru'o// nas dang gro dang til dang 'bras so ba dang ma sha ste 'bru lnga'o// br-i hasti dang kaN+Da ka r-i dang a pa rA dzi ta dang / daN Dota pa la dang / ha sa dwe ba ste sman lnga'o// pad me dang gdugs ni shog pu la byas pa'o// dkyil
131a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ni ser po 'ba' zhig las byas pa'o// de yang lha dang phyag mtshan med pa'i gdon dang gzhal yas khang pa'i rnam pa'i rnam pa 'ba' zhig bri'o// gal te nus pa med na sngar gyi tshems shing dor ba'i dkyil
131a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi rnam pa lta bu'o// de nas bum pa lhag par gnas par bya ste/ me tog la sogs pa mchod pa'i yo byad sna tshogs pa dang / gtor ma rnams sta gon byas nas/ slob dpon bdag nyid ting 'dzin
131b1(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs par bsgoms lnga dkyil 'khor nye bar bsdus te/ phyag gnyis pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis gnas par bya'o// de nas skad cig mas rnam par rgyal ba'i bum par ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo rdzogs par bsam//
131b2(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi yum bzhi la ni yum re dang ka pA la re re'o// thugs dang gsung dang sa dang dam tshig gi 'khor lo'o// de nas 'bar ba'i sngags dang phyag rgyas rnam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi
131b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo mdun du spyan drungs te bum pa'i lha rnams la bstim mo// de dag ma lus par zhu ba las ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i chus gang bar bsam mo// de nas bum pa'i gnas lnga dag tu rdo rje'i phyag rgyas reg cing /
131b4(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra pad+ma a mr-i taM su bA~M shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma d+hA tu swa b+ha ny+dza sarba d+harmA na su bi shud+d+ha d+harma d+hA tu sarbanA ku ru ku ru swA hA/ zhes lan+d+ra gsum brjod par bya'o// de nas me tog gi phreng ba dang 'brel pA'i rdo rje bu mo pa'i steng du bzhag
131b5(rgyud 'grel): ste/ lag pa g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis bzung ste/ lag pa g.yas pas bgrang phreng snying gar bzung nas 'khor lo'i gtso bo la ni brgya bzlas zhing / 'khor gyi lha rnams la ni nyer gcig bzla'o// la sa thams
131b6(rgyud 'grel): cad pa la ni suM b+ha ni brgya rtsa brgyad/ bzlas nas phyi'i mchod pa lnga dang yid las byung ba'i lha mo bcu drug dang / rin po che sna bdun gyis kyang mchod de spos snod dang / rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa'i lag pas/ dpal
132a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lo sgyur// sku gsum ye shes lnga dang ldan// 'gro ba'i mgon la phyag 'tshalo// ji snyed rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// rtog pa'i 'ching bya gcod
132a2(rgyud 'grel): mdzad cing // 'jig rten don du rab 'jug pa// de snyed pa la rtag phyag 'tshal// zhes bya bas bstod la/ yi ge brgya pa brjod de/ gtor ma byin gyis brlab par bya'o// de nas dpa' bo'i dga' ston dang / tshogs
132a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'khor lho byin gyis brlang par bya'o// zhes bya ba ni bum pa lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o// dA nas rdul chen gyi dkyil 'khor ni dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya zhing ras ris la ni dkyil 'khor
132a4(rgyud 'grel): mngon du dmigs te/ bdag 'jog byas nas slob ma la dbang bskur bar bya'o// de la phyogs bzhir slob dpon bzhi 'am bdag gcig pu yang rung ste/ bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pa'i dri chus khrus byas nas/ gos
132a5(rgyud 'grel): dang phyag rgya lnga la sogs pa'i rgyan gyi chos su zhugs la dkyil 'khor gyi lho phyogs nas kha byang du bltas te/ stan 'thon po la 'jug par bya'o// de nas yang snga ma ltar ting nge 'dzin rdzogs par bsgoms te/ phyag
132a6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas go rims bzhin du dbang bdun dang / dbang gsum po dang / bzhi pa'i mthar thug pa rnams dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo las blang bar bya'o// de ni bdag 'jug pa'o// de nas
132b1(rgyud 'grel): slob ma gzhug pa ni/ yol ba'i phyi rol du maN+Dal byed du bcug la phyag gsum byas te/ me tog snyim par bzung nas gnas pa la slob dpon gyis nang nas kastaM b+ho zhes brjod par bya'o// bde chen bdag ni bskal pa
132b2(rgyud 'grel): bzang zhes bya ba ni slob ma'i lan no// de ltar lan gsum bya'o// dgos pa ci'i phyir 'jug/ phyag rgya chen po'i dngo sA grub kyi phyir ro zhes slob ma'i lan no// de nas dung chos spyi bar bzhag ste/ khyor par chu lan
132b3(rgyud 'grel): gsum blud la/ sum b+ha nI bzlas pa'i ku shwa'i chus bsang ba bya'o// de nas dbab pa'i cho ga bya sti mtshal chen bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas/ dur khrod ras la byugs nas ni// bsdus pa'i phye ma cha gcig dang // byil nag po'i
132b4(rgyud 'grel): bshang ba ni// de mnyam che ni gcig tu bya// de rnams gu gul nog por sbyar// dur khrod sol ba blangs nas ni// mchod yon snod du bdug pa sbyar// sku yi dkyil 'khor rdzogs par ni// slob ma'i lus lo rab bkod
132b5(rgyud 'grel): dede las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs// rgyun mi 'chad par 'jug par bsam// slob ma'i lag nas bzung nas ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi mkha' 'gro ma// rtse gcig sems kyis
132b6(rgyud 'grel): bzlas par bya// de la sku babs na ni 'phar pa la sogs pa lus kyi rdzu 'phrul 'byung ngo // gsung babs na ni dbang pos mi song pa'i don rnams smra bar 'gyur ro// thugs babs na ni mngon par shes pa lnga la sogs
133a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i yon tan 'byung ngo // ye shes babs na ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas par 'gyur// do nas dbab pa bsdus la/ lag pa spyi bor bzhug ste/ snying po'i sngags de ltad yan/
133a2(rgyud 'grel): bdun bzlas pas bsrung ba bya'o// de nas go bskon par bya'o// de nas sum b+ha ni bzlas pa'i chus bsangs pa'i sna tshogs pa'i mdog gam kha dog ser po'i dar ras kyis gdong g.yogs bcings la stong g.yogs
133a3(rgyud 'grel): dang smad g.yogs kyang sbyin no// de la gdong g.yogs bcing ba'i sngags nI/ oM dA da sha aM ga ni ro d+ha ka ri Ni hUM phaT/ de nas brtul zhugs dbog par bya ste/ 'gro ba bgrod pa rnams kyi brtul zhugs sbyin byad
133a4(rgyud 'grel): dag ni// srog gcod mi bden gzhan nor gzhan gyi chung ma de bzhin chang gi btung ba spongs// 'khor bar rdo rje zhags pas rang gi dge ba 'joms byed sdig pa lnga po 'di dag yin// gang dag gang gi duso byung sum
133a5(rgyud 'grel): tsucu mi yi bla ma de yi mtshan gyis rab tu sbyin bya ste// sna tshogs gtso bo srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms mdzad bka' 'di khyod kyis kyang nI bskyung bar bya// tsha lo kha na ma tho'i zas dang brjod ngan 'byung po lha min dbang
133a6(rgyud 'grel): po'i chos// ba lang bud med skyes rnams de mi yi bla mi lnga po la yang gnod mi bya// snying grogs la 'khu rje dpon de bzhin sum cu mi yi bla ma yid chos dge 'dun la'ang // dbang po rnams kyi chags pa zhes byas mi
133b1(rgyud 'grel): yau bdag po'i brtul zhugs nyi shu rtsa lnga yis// de ltar brtul zhugs phog nas/ de nyid gsum lanu bdun bzlas pa'o me tog gcig lag pa'i pad ma'i dbus su gtad la shrI he ru kA ya bid+ma ho bid+yA rA dzA ya d+hi ma
133b2(rgyud 'grel): he swA hA zhes bya bas nang du gzhug par bya'o// de nas rdo rje skyob dpon gyis lag pa nas bkri zhing / las kyi rdo rje phyi bzhin 'brang bas dkyil 'khor lan gsum skor ba byas te/ dang por rigs nges par bya ba'i phyir/ dkyil
133b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi shar sgo nas/ slob dpon gyi bden pa bdar ba sngon du song bas me tog 'dor du gzhug go/ de las bden pa bdar ba'i tshig ni/ don dam smra ba'i seng ge rnal 'byor zhes bya ba// srid pa'i nyon mongs gcod pa'i
133b4(rgyud 'grel): don la shin tu mkhas gyur pa// srid pa'i nyes brgyad bskyod pa'i nyon mongs choms mdzod la// rnal 'byor don dam rgyal po'i de nyid grub par mdzad du gsol// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// he ru ka dpal
133b5(rgyud 'grel): grong khyer mchog/ snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di ru ni// bdog gis slob ma gzhug par bgyi// 'di yi dngos grub cir gyur dang // rigs gang la ni skal ldan dang // bsod nams ci 'dra las byung ba// de 'dra dkyil 'khor
133b6(rgyud 'grel): 'di ru shog/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ku la bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/ zhes brjod la hUM zhes brjod pas lag pa'i bar nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su me tog 'dir du gzhug go/ de nas oM de bin+di ya ud+h+ye TA ya swA hA zhes bya bas gdod
134a1(rgyud 'grel): g.yogs bkrol la/ dkyil 'khor dang lha'i de nyid dang me tog ltung ba'i gnas dang / rigs rnams bstan par bya'o// de nas de bzhin du bskor bas/ byang phyogs kyi sgor khyer te/ bum pa gan/
134a2(rgyud 'grel): gyi dung chos las rnam par rgyal ba'i dung chos su me tog 'dor du gzhug go// nyung zad nyung zad blugs la lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe bo dang sprin lag gis skyes pa'i gnas lnga dag tu dung chos kyi chus sngags 'di dag gis/
134a3(rgyud 'grel): bsangs la/ de nas ku sha'i chus khams lnga dag par bya ba'i phyir lan gsum du chu'i dbang bskur bar bya'o// de la sngags ni oM A I r-I U lAM pany+tsa skAn+ta bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/ de nas sngar bzhin gnas lnga dag tu AM
134a4(rgyud 'grel): a i r-i u l-i bAny+tsa ta thA ga ta bi shud d+hA swA hI zhes bya bas bsangs la/ ri mor bris pa 'am 'bur du bskos pa'am gos kyi yang rung ste/ rgyal ba'i rig sa lnga'i bdag nyid can gyi cod pan bskon par bya'o// 'dis
134a5(rgyud 'grel): ni phung po lnga dag pa yin la de ltar byang phyogs sku yi sa gzhir chu cod pan gnyis kyis lus dag par byed pa'i dbang yin no// de nas de bzhin du bskor bas lho'i sgor khyer te/ shes rab pha rol phyin ma dag
134a6(rgyud 'grel): par bya ba'i phyir sngar bzhin skye ba'i gnas lnga dag tu dung chos kyi chus oM a A ai ha hA haHho pro daM sha pA ra mi tA pa ri pA Ni sAhA/ zhes bya ba 'ongs bsangs la gser ram dngul lam ngar la sogs pa yang rung
134b1(rgyud 'grel): ste/ dUr+ya dbyangs bcing bar bya'o// de nas nyi zla dag par b+ha ba ri m+b+hir sngar bzhon skyo ba'o'i gnas lnga dag tu mo s+than+taHn+ta sha d+hA kA swAhA zhes bya bas bsangs la d+hA t+pal du snying gar lan gyu sum bsngal ba mngon du 'dra
134b2(rgyud 'grel): bas+t+ra spyi bor bzhag par bya'o// de ltar lho phyogs gsung gis gar ngag dag pa'i dbang rnam pa gnyis so// de nas thugs rdo rje rig par bya ba'i phyir shar sgor khyer te yul dang dbang po dge par bya ba'i phyir/
134b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin skye ba'i gnas lnga dag tu o A A ai aM ar Ar o au// a la A la bISh+Te nI ya bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/ zhes bya bas bsangs la/ spyi bo dang mgrin pa dang rna ba dang dpung pa dang lag pa dang ska rags dang
134b4(rgyud 'grel): pa dog tu me tog gi phreng ba bcu bcings la/ lag par rdo rje'i sor gdub gtang ba ni dz+dzan+d+he brtul zhugs kyi dbang ngo // de nas nyon mongs po can gyi yid dag par bya ba'i phyir sngar bzhin skye ba'i gnas lnga dag tu
134b5(rgyud 'grel): oM ha hA ya yA ra rA wa wA lA lA tsi tur brah+ma bi har+thi shud+d+he swA hA zhes bya bas bsangs la sngar gyi me tog lgang ba blangs la spyi bor bzhag ste/ me tog gar babs pa'i rigs dang mthun pa'i ming gos dbang bskur bar bya'o//
134b6(rgyud 'grel): de ltar brtul zhugs dang ming shar phyogs thugs kyi sa gzhir sbyin no// de nas nub sgo ye shes sa gzhir khyer te ye shes dag par bya ba'i phyir sngar bzhin skye ba'i gnas lnga dag tu oM k+Sha d+harma tsakra pra baR+Sha ka swA hA/ zhes
135a1(rgyud 'grel): bya bas bsangs la d+hU rje dril bu lag tu gtang da/ rnam par dag pa'i lam ston pa'i phyir rjes su gnang ba'i dbang sbyin par bya'o// de nas phyi'i ngag dag pa ston du song bas bum
135a2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang gsang ba dang shes rab ye shes kyi dbang khyim pa'i phyogs dang rab tu byung ba'i phyogs la rim pa bzhin du 'am tshig gis brda sprad par bya'o// dbang bdun gyi rjes la'am skabs 'dir yang rung ste rigs
135a3(rgyud 'grel): drug gi dam tshig drang rtsa ba'i ltung ba la sogs pa'i dam tshig dbog par bya'o// de ltar na rang don gyi dbang rnam pa bcu ste 'jig rten pa'i dbang ngo// 'jig rten las 'das pa tha snyad pa dang / mtshan nyid
135a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dbye bas gnyis te/ tha snyad pa ni khyab bdag rnam pa gsum gyi dbang yin la/ mtshan nyid pa ni bsgom pa las byung ba'i ye shes nang gi byang chub kyi shing drung du thob pa gang yin pa ste/ rgyas par
135a5(rgyud 'grel): ni bla mo'i man ngag las shes par bya'o// gang phyir dbang gi don la ni/ chen po rnams sbyar te me tog 'dzin pa rnams la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// kha cig gsang sngags grub don du/ dkyil
135a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor 'dir ni 'jug par byed// bsod nams 'dod pa de las gzhan// gzhan dag 'jig rten gzhan don gnyer// 'jig rten pha rol don gnyer bar// dad pa mang du byed pa yis// blo ldan dkyil 'khor
135b1(rgyud 'grel): 'jug bya yi// tshe 'di don du gnyer mi bya// tshe 'di don du gnyer ba la// 'jig rten pha rol don mi 'byung // 'jig rten pha rol don gnyer mis// tshe 'dir yang ni 'bras bu rgyus// zhes bya bas 'jig rten
135b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dngos grub kyi phyir min gyi/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub kyi phyir bsam pa brtan po la sbyar bar bya'o// 'khor ba'i dgra las rnam rgyal ba// dpa' chen khyed bdag ston pa bso// slob dpon
135b3(rgyud 'grel): khyod ni dgongasu gsol// byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa// mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo// dam tshig de nyid bdag la gsol// byang chub sems kyang bdag la gsol// sangs rgyas chos dang dge
135b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dun te// skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la gsol// thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu// mgon pos bdag ni 'jug tu gsol// zhes lan gsum bzlas/ zhes bya ba ni slob ma gzhug pa'o// de nas
135b5(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon bdag nyid skad cig mas rang snang gi rog mA dang / gnas lngar byin gyis brlabs pa byas nas/ slob ma rnams zhal nas gzhug pa'i sbyor bas/ thig le'i rnam par zhu ba dang / lhan cig skyes
135b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mthar yum gyi lhums su spros lani/ grangs ji snyed pa de snyed kyi hU~M gi rnam par bsams la de dag yongs su gyur pa las/ phyag gnyis pa'i he ru kar bsams te de nas de dag rdo rje'i lam nas
136a1(rgyud 'grel): drungs te blugs kha nas rgyu la/ mdun du rang la mngon par phyogs b+haR+Sha m+b+ha tshogs pad ma'o gang nu rol 'khyod par bsdus ma// de nas de dag la mchod pa lngas
136a2(rgyud 'grel): mchod la/ 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// grang+ge rig pa chen po 'i// khyod ni tshul chen snad yin te// gaskyeng sdug sa spyod rdol cho ga nAM// khyod la yang dam bstan par bya// hUM gsung
136a3(rgyud 'grel): thugs kyi rdo rje can// dus gsum byung ba'i spangs rgyas rnams// de dag gis kyang gsang sngags kyi// cho ga bzang po 'di mkhyen nas// dpa' bos byang chub shing drung du// thams cad mkhyen pa mtshan
136a4(rgyud 'grel): med brnyes// gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med de// skyob pa dpal ldan he rU kas// bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa'o// dpung tshon dag kyang des bcom ste// 'jig rten 'jug pa yongs mkhyen nas//
136a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo bskor nas mya ngan 'a'ongs// de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir// bu yi blo gros 'di gyis shig/ ces bya ba ni rjes su gnang ba'i sbyin pa'o// de nas sems kyang rmongs pa'i phyir// dam pa'i
136a6(rgyud 'grel): man ngag/ la brtan nas// dbang gi de nyid gsal bar bya// dpol ldan dang po'i sangs rgyas dang // rdo rje mkha' 'gre grur drang ni// de bzhin 'phrul dra ba dang // bde mchog la brten lcang gi rkyen//
136b1(rgyud 'grel): s+'ub+h+ya rgyal ba'i sgras/ dpal 'jigs byud m+b+ha lo lA nAs byasnun pa/ la ba spyong glo sma na b+h+yo rnam par dag pal ma b+h+yo bslar ba/ rab tu b+hU brgyugs pa
136b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyogar gyi mkhan pa de nyid kyi spyan b+ha / kyi lo ts+tshi Shi mamra'i dge slong grags 'acu ri shes rab kyis bir// log par dang po'i hU~M ba rnams// lom 'dir dbang ba ma yin no// de b+hi
136b3(rgyud 'grel): dang ba.A r+yA mA p+ta de// hriM mai rje yi bdag la gnang // kyi bas gangs tham ma ldan mos// nami dam pa rtag bstan pas// la mi 'di rim gyis bgrang byas te// mi 'gyur ye chos
136b4(rgyud 'grel): mchog thob shog/
137a1(rgyud 'grel): dbang gi cho ga'i rim pa bzhugs/
137b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ a b+hi She kA bi d+haM krA ma nA ma/ bod skad du/ dbang gi cho ga'i rim pa zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshalo// dbang gi bya ba bri bar bya'o// dang po slob mas lan
137b2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis lan gsum du gsol ba gdab pa dang / rdo rje slob dpon gyis slob ma la dbang gi yo byad thams cad 'byor pa yod dam zhes dri'o// bdag la thams cad yang dag par yod do zhes pa de la/ ji ltar de'i las
137b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi sgrib pa dang ldan pa de slob dpon gyis rab tu 'joms pa'i don ni/ de'i snying gar kaM gi yi ge zhu ba las/ las kyi sgrib pa'i rang bzhin gdug pa can ma lus pa rnam par bsam mo// de bzhin du de'i lte ba'i gnasu
